translation.en: Terrific!
translation.zh: 精彩！

translation.en: -[alert buzzing] -[creaking]
translation.zh: （最高安防 仅限授权员工入内）

translation.en: [man] Special delivery for Mr. Loon E. Tunes.
translation.zh: 给先生的特快专递 精神病先生？

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Catching some Z's, huh?
translation.zh: 你睡觉呢？

translation.en: Did you go pee-pee while you sleepy, huh?
translation.zh: 睡觉觉的时候会尿尿吗？

translation.en: I heard you can't hold it in.
translation.zh: 听说你憋不住尿

translation.en: Hartman?
translation.zh: 哈特曼？

translation.en: Hey, you quakin' in your boots?
translation.zh: 喂 你害怕了？

translation.en: You better be, 'cause I'm your new attendant.
translation.zh: 你最好害怕我 因为我是你的新护工

translation.en: The name's Hal L.
translation.zh: 我叫哈尔

translation.en: And you're in my world now.
translation.zh: 你以后要听我的了

translation.en: Psycho on the loose!
translation.zh: 精神病跑了！

translation.en: ♪ When my eyes beheld an eerie sight ♪ ♪ For my monster from his slab Began to rise ♪
translation.zh: （塞勒姆 拥有女巫历史的城市）

translation.en: Good morning!
translation.zh: 早上好！

translation.en: Halloween's upon us!
translation.zh: 万圣节要到了！

translation.en: [woman on radio] Hello, my witches and warlocks. It's your ghoulish DJ Aurora.
translation.zh: 我的女巫和术士们 大家好 我是你们恐怖的主播欧若拉

translation.en: I hope you're ready for tomorrow night and all the spooky things that frighten.
translation.zh: 希望你们已经为明晚 各种恐怖诡异的东西做好了准备

translation.en: I know I am.
translation.zh: 反正我已经准备好了

translation.en: Hey, you missed. The yolk's on you.
translation.zh: 没打中 失手了吧

translation.en: Thanks for the free breakfast.
translation.zh: 谢谢你们给的免费早餐

translation.en: Rocky Balboa style.
translation.zh: 拳王洛奇的招式

translation.en: I'm making the kids' costumes out of tinfoil
translation.zh: 我用锡纸给孩子们做服装

translation.en: 'cause I'm old-school, Teresa.
translation.zh: 因为我很守旧 特蕾萨

translation.en: -Thanks! -[woman] Have fun!
translation.zh: -谢谢！ -玩得开心！

translation.en: Violet Valentine.
translation.zh: 维奥蕾特·瓦伦丁

translation.en: [woman] Have a happy Halloween tomorrow, Hubie.
translation.zh: 祝你明天万圣节快乐 修比

translation.en: You, too, Mrs. Banerjee. I hope you get more tricks than treats.
translation.zh: 你也是 班纳吉太太 希望你被捣蛋的次数比得到的糖多

translation.en: -[Banerjee chuckles] -Okay. Number 59. Looking for 59.
translation.zh: 好 59号 59号客人

translation.en: Yep!
translation.zh: 这里

translation.en: Right here, Pubie.
translation.zh: 这里呢 怂逼

translation.en: Give me a half-pound of roast beef.
translation.zh: 给我半斤烤牛肉

translation.en: Mr. Landolfa…
translation.zh: 兰道尔法先生

translation.en: [stammers] …Hubie. With an H.
translation.zh: 我叫“修比”

translation.en: Not anymore. [laughs]
translation.zh: 以后就不叫了

translation.en: [Hubie] Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Mrs. Phillips, I'll be with you in a minute.
translation.zh: 菲利普斯太太 我马上给你服务

translation.en: Is that the first girl you ever talked to, Pubie?
translation.zh: 那是你说过话的 第一个女生吗 怂逼？

translation.en: Hey, no. I talk to my girlfriend all the time.
translation.zh: 喂 不是 我总和我女朋友说话

translation.en: -I've never seen you with a girlfriend. -She is a Canadian resident of Canada.
translation.zh: -我从来没看见过你有女朋友 -她是居住在加拿大的加拿大人

translation.en: Uh, Canada Dry region.
translation.zh: 加拿大姜汁汽水区

translation.en: Mr. O'Doyle.
translation.zh: 欧道尔先生

translation.en: Shouldn't you and your cohort be, uh, in school right now?
translation.zh: 你和你的小伙伴 现在不应该在学校吗？

translation.en: -It's Sunday, dumbass. -[Hubie mutters]
translation.zh: 今天是周日 蠢货

translation.en: [Landolfa] Know what? I don't want the roast beef.
translation.zh: 这样吧？我不想要烤牛肉了

translation.en: -Give me some of the lamb's head. -Lamb's head? We don't have lamb's head.
translation.zh: -给我来点羊头吧 -羊头？我们不卖羊头啊

translation.en: -No? What's that right there? -Which one?
translation.zh: -不卖？那这个是什么？ -哪个？

translation.en: Got ya!
translation.zh: 吓到你了！

translation.en: It's fun working with you, always.
translation.zh: 和你一起工作 一直都很有趣

translation.en: That is a good one.
translation.zh: 这个不错

translation.en: Hey, you got Sergeant Downey.
translation.zh: 我是唐尼警佐

translation.en: Hey, Steve. It's Kenny Fonda with the Westford PD.
translation.zh: 史蒂夫 你好 我是韦斯特福德警局的坎尼·方达

translation.en: -How you doin' there, Kenny? -[Kenny] Good, buddy. Good.
translation.zh: -你怎么样 坎尼？ -很好 兄弟

translation.en: Hey, I just wanted to give you a heads-up.
translation.zh: 喂 我想打电话给你提个醒

translation.en: We had someone escape from the psych ward up here.
translation.zh: 我们这边精神病院有人逃走了

translation.en: A guy from your neck of the woods.
translation.zh: 你管辖那一片区的

translation.en: Richard Hartman.
translation.zh: 理查德·哈特曼

translation.en: Richie Hartman's been locked up since Carter was president.
translation.zh: 理查·哈特曼从卡特是总统的时候 就一直关着

translation.en: [Kenny] Yeah. Just thought you might wanna know
translation.zh: 好了 我觉得你应该知道一下

translation.en: in case he gets sentimental for his hometown.
translation.zh: 万一他想念家乡 回去了

translation.en: And didn't you testify against him, Steve?
translation.zh: 当时是不是你给他证明 有精神病的 史蒂夫？

translation.en: He doesn't strike me as a forgive-and-forget type.
translation.zh: 我感觉他不是那种 有过节能轻易原谅并忘掉的人

translation.en: Yeah, but you know what? I hope he comes looking for me.
translation.zh: 行 但你知道吗？我希望他来找我

translation.en: 'Cause he will be in a world of pain.
translation.zh: 因为我会让他无比痛苦

translation.en: -Of pain-- -[loud slam]
translation.zh: 无比…

translation.en: -[Kenny] What the hell? -I gotta go, Kenny.
translation.zh: -搞什么？ -我要挂了 坎尼

translation.en: -Hubie, what do you want? -Hey, Officer Steve.
translation.zh: -修比 你要干嘛？ -嗨 史蒂夫警官

translation.en: I saw Andy O'Doyle buying suspiciously massive amount of eggs and toilet paper.
translation.zh: 我看到安迪·欧道尔买了 惊人数量的鸡蛋和厕纸 非常可疑

translation.en: -Not a crime to buy eggs or toilet paper. -Oh, yeah. That goes without saying.
translation.zh: 买鸡蛋或者厕纸不是犯罪 好吧 不言而喻

translation.en: But it doesn't take Sherlock Holmes to deduce malicious intent.
translation.zh: 但不言而喻不会影响 夏洛克·福尔摩斯去推论蓄意动机

translation.en: -Okay. Yeah. -Lambardi's Pizza's doin' a sale tomorrow.
translation.zh: -好吧 行 -兰巴蒂披萨明天搞促销

translation.en: One slice, one soda, one dollar, if you wear a costume to the shop.
translation.zh: 只要穿着万圣节服装来店里 一块披萨、一瓶苏打水 一共一美元

translation.en: To me, that's a great deal, but it's also a riot waiting to happen.
translation.zh: 我觉得是很划算的 但也一定需要在人群嘈杂中等待

translation.en: Call the hotline.
translation.zh: 有事打警局热线

translation.en: I did call the hotline 100 times,
translation.zh: 我打了警局热线100次

translation.en: but I think you guys got a connection problem.
translation.zh: 但你们应该是线路连接出问题了

translation.en: -Salem PD. -Yes. Your officer, this is Hubie Dubo--
translation.zh: -塞勒姆警局 -喂 警官 我是修比·杜布…

translation.en: -Hubie, get in here. -Okay.
translation.zh: -修比 进来 -好

translation.en: -Bring it in here. Get in here. -What's up?
translation.zh: -从这里进来 过里啊 -什么事？

translation.en: Now, it's Halloween. In Salem.
translation.zh: 万圣节到了 而且这里是塞勒姆

translation.en: And I got a lot of real issues on my plate.
translation.zh: 我现在有很多事情要忙

translation.en: -[Hubie] I know. -[tires screech]
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: [Andy] Look who's here.
translation.zh: 看谁来了

translation.en: -[boy 1] Hubie! -[boy 2] Hubie!
translation.zh: - 修比！ - 修比！

translation.en: -Do we do-- -Get out of here!
translation.zh: -我们可以… -出去！

translation.en: Over and out-- [thuds]
translation.zh: 通话结束…

translation.en: -[boys clamoring] -[Andy] Guys, let's get him!
translation.zh: 大家快上 我们去抓他！

translation.en: [boys shouting] Come on! Come on!
translation.zh: 快！

translation.en: ♪ Happy Halloween Happy Halloween… ♪
translation.zh: （杜布瓦）

translation.en: [boy 1] Eat some shit!
translation.zh: 吃屎吧！

translation.en: Snitch.
translation.zh: 告密者

translation.en: [Hubie] Why?
translation.zh: 怎么回事？

translation.en: [boy 3] He flew like 25 feet!
translation.zh: 他飞出去能有八米！

translation.en: Well, hello, there.
translation.zh: 你好呀

translation.en: You need a hand?
translation.zh: 需要帮忙吗？

translation.en: Boy, that was quite a tumble you took there, fella.
translation.zh: 天啊 朋友 你刚才这一摔挺狠的

translation.en: Nope. That's--
translation.zh: 没有 那是…

translation.en: Nothing broken, physically speaking.
translation.zh: 没摔坏 身体没毛病

translation.en: Well, it's not right what those hooligans did.
translation.zh: 那些小流氓做的事情 很不对

translation.en: We gotta expect a scare here or there. Kids being kids.
translation.zh: 小打小闹都是正常的 孩子毕竟是孩子

translation.en: -Oh, say, that's some heck of a thermos. -[Hubie] Yeah, that's my baby.
translation.zh: -你这个保温杯不错啊 -对 这是我的宝贝

translation.en: It's kind of like a Swiss Army thermos. I made it when I was in the Scouts.
translation.zh: 这个可以说是瑞士军刀保温杯了 我当童子军时做的

translation.en: Maybe you've had enough bike riding for one day.
translation.zh: 你今天骑车够多了

translation.en: -How about if I give you a lift home? -You're not gonna have to drive far.
translation.zh: -不如我开车送你？ -你不用开太远

translation.en: 'Cause I live right over here.
translation.zh: 因为我就住在这里

translation.en: Your kids must have helped you with all of this.
translation.zh: 肯定是你的孩子们帮你弄的吧

translation.en: Oh, yeah, I don't have any kids. As far as I know.
translation.zh: 我没有孩子 据我所知没有

translation.en: No, I definitely don't.
translation.zh: 没有 我肯定没有

translation.en: I do have a girlfriend. She lives up in Canada.
translation.zh: 但我有女朋友 她住在加拿大

translation.en: Northern section. Ontarionto.
translation.zh: 北方地区 安大略多伦多

translation.en: So, you probably couldn't find her up there.
translation.zh: 所以应该在这里看不到她

translation.en: -Ah. Look at those purple mums. -Mom planted those.
translation.zh: -看看这些菊花 -妈妈种的

translation.en: And you gotta love the old-school ghost you got working over there.
translation.zh: 你肯定喜欢你那边正在做的 老式传统的鬼

translation.en: [Hubie] Yep.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Scary ghost. Yes.
translation.zh: 可怕的鬼 对

translation.en: And looks like we're neighbors.
translation.zh: 看来我们是邻居

translation.en: 'Cause I just moved in right there this morning.
translation.zh: 因为我今天早上刚搬进来

translation.en: -[Hubie] You moved here? -I'm Walter Lambert.
translation.zh: -你刚搬进来？ -我叫沃特·兰伯特

translation.en: Hubie Dubois. It's a pleasure, Hubie. I'll tell you what.
translation.zh: -我叫修比·杜布瓦 -幸会 修比 我告诉你

translation.en: I'm gonna invite you and Mom over for dinner once I get my kitchen set up,
translation.zh: 等我把厨房收拾好 我要邀请你和妈妈过来吃晚餐

translation.en: 'cause I make the best chili east side of the Rockies.
translation.zh: 因为我做的甜椒炖肉 是落基山脉东边最棒的

translation.en: Ooh. My belly just said yes for the both of us.
translation.zh: 我的肚子刚刚替我们两个答应了

translation.en: And your butt just made some room.
translation.zh: 你的屁股刚刚腾出了一点空间

translation.en: They must've got loosened out of me with the landing.
translation.zh: 肯定是刚才落地的时候 放跑了气体

translation.en: -It's-- it's fine. It's natural. -It is.
translation.zh: -没事的 这是自然现象 -对

translation.en: -Yeah. -Thanks.
translation.zh: -是的 -谢谢

translation.en: Anyway, you take care, Hubie. All right?
translation.zh: 总之 你保重 你叫修比 对吧？

translation.en: -Yeah. -And have a happy Halloween.
translation.zh: -对 -祝你万圣节快乐

translation.en: Oh, and Hubie.
translation.zh: 对了 修比

translation.en: If you ever hear some commotion
translation.zh: 如果你听到我房子

translation.en: coming from my house, it's nothing to be concerned about.
translation.zh: 里传来骚乱的声音 没什么好担心的

translation.en: So, you don't need to come over and check on me or anything.
translation.zh: 你不用过来查看一切是否安好

translation.en: In fact, it's important that you don't.
translation.zh: 其实 你不要过来 这对我很重要

translation.en: Sure thing, Mr. Lambert.
translation.zh: 好的 兰伯特先生

translation.en: Walter.
translation.zh: 沃特

translation.en: Hey, I'm home.
translation.zh: 嘿 我回家了

translation.en: [woman] Did that darn skeleton frighten you again, Hubie?
translation.zh: 那个该死的骨架 又吓到你了吗 修比？

translation.en: No! I was just practicing yelling, Mom. Everything's good.
translation.zh: 没有！我只是在练习叫喊 妈妈 我一点事都没有

translation.en: Oh, dear boy. This town is making you so jittery.
translation.zh: 好 宝贝儿子 这个城市让你有点心神不宁

translation.en: It just breaks my heart.
translation.zh: 太让我心碎了

translation.en: I'm fine. Is that a new shirt?
translation.zh: 我没事 那是新上衣吗？

translation.en: Mrs. Banerjee and I went to the thrift store today.
translation.zh: 班纳吉太太今天和我去了二手商店

translation.en: Guess how much? Fifty cents!
translation.zh: 你猜这个多少钱？五毛！

translation.en: "Boner donor?" Now, what does that even mean?
translation.zh: “糗捐献者”？那是什么意思啊？

translation.en: Well, I think boner's another word for a mistake.
translation.zh: “糗” 换句话说就是错误

translation.en: Like, I made a big boner in math class.
translation.zh: 比如 我今天在数学课堂上糗大了

translation.en: So, maybe boner donor means I donate mistakes.
translation.zh: 所以或许糗捐献者 意思是我捐献了错误

translation.en: That makes sense.
translation.zh: 有道理

translation.en: I met the fellow who moved into the Andersons' house next door.
translation.zh: 我见到了隔壁搬进安德森房子的人

translation.en: Walter Lambert. Seemed like good people.
translation.zh: 沃特·兰伯特 看样子是个好人

translation.en: -Oh, well, that's nice. -Yeah.
translation.zh: 那不错

translation.en: Some improvement over those Andersons.
translation.zh: 应该比安德森一家有进步

translation.en: The way they used to toss firecrackers at you.
translation.zh: 他们以前往你身上扔爆竹

translation.en: Oh, no. That was the Epsteins.
translation.zh: 不是 那是爱普斯坦一家

translation.en: The Andersons used to throw garbage into my bedroom window.
translation.zh: 安德森一家以前往我的窗户里扔垃圾

translation.en: Well, who was it chased you around the yard with a tennis racket?
translation.zh: 拿着网球拍在院子里追你的人是谁？

translation.en: That was Dad.
translation.zh: 那是爸爸

translation.en: God rest his soul.
translation.zh: 愿他安息

translation.en: -Oh, for sure. -[Mom] Cookies are done.
translation.zh: -是的 -饼干好了

translation.en: You wanna help me frost 'em?
translation.zh: 你要帮我给这些撒糖霜吗？

translation.en: -Can I lick the spoon, or… -[Mom] Deal!
translation.zh: -我可以舔勺子吗 或者… -成交！

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: [chuckles] Now, I know that Halloween is very special to you, sweet boy.
translation.zh: 我知道万圣节 对你来说很特别 乖儿子

translation.en: It's been your favorite holiday since you were knee-high.
translation.zh: 从你到我膝盖那么高的时候 万圣节就一直对你很特别

translation.en: Well, we're Jewish, so that eliminated Christmas and Easter and Ash Wednesday.
translation.zh: 我们是犹太人 所以就没有圣诞节、复活节和圣灰日

translation.en: And I am so proud at how hard you work
translation.zh: 我很骄傲你这么努力工作

translation.en: to make sure that Halloween is safe and fun for everyone in this town.
translation.zh: 保证万圣节对这个城市里的每一个人 都是安全有趣的

translation.en: I'm sensin' a big "but" coming.
translation.zh: 我感觉到你下一句话是“但是…”呢

translation.en: -But… -Okay.
translation.zh: -但是…… -好吧

translation.en: …this town is as full of bullies now as it ever was in the 1600s.
translation.zh: 现在这座城市里面全是霸凌者 不像17世纪初那会儿了

translation.en: You have to learn to stand up for yourself.
translation.zh: 你必须要学着为自己反抗

translation.en: I just get scared.
translation.zh: 我只是害怕

translation.en: I know you do.
translation.zh: 我知道你害怕

translation.en: We all get scared.
translation.zh: 我们都会害怕

translation.en: But this year, you're gonna have to find that bravery that's deep within you.
translation.zh: 但是今年 你必须要找到 内心深处的那种勇敢

translation.en: It's time.
translation.zh: 该这样做了

translation.en: Ah, the good old days.
translation.zh: 美好的旧时光

translation.en: When the town toughs only used to throw crab apples.
translation.zh: 那时候城里的坏家伙只会扔酸苹果

translation.en: Ah, Officer Steve. You always had it going on.
translation.zh: 史蒂夫警官 你总是做什么都很顺利

translation.en: "Most likely to marry his pillow." Still don't get that one.
translation.zh: “最可能跟他的枕头结婚 还是那么无厘头”

translation.en: "Most friendly."
translation.zh: “最友好”

translation.en: "Most popular."
translation.zh: “最受欢迎”

translation.en: "Best looking."
translation.zh: “最漂亮”

translation.en: The high school hat trick.
translation.zh: 高中三连冠

translation.en: Could not have happened to a nicer woman.
translation.zh: 找不到一个更好的女人 去颁发三连冠了

translation.en: Maybe if I wasn't such a scaredy-cat like mom was sayin',
translation.zh: 或许如果我不是像妈妈说的那么怯懦

translation.en: I would have asked you out.
translation.zh: 我就会邀请你约会了

translation.en: And the cutest couple would have been Violet and Hubie.
translation.zh: 最可爱情侣就会是维奥蕾特和修比了

translation.en: Monster! [screams]
translation.zh: 怪兽！

translation.en: [Mom] Hubie, what was that?
translation.zh: 修比 什么声音？

translation.en: Sorry, Mom! I'll clean that up!
translation.zh: 抱歉 妈妈！我会清理干净！

translation.en: [Mom] Did you make a messy?
translation.zh: 你闯祸了吗？

translation.en: [Hubie] I said I would clean it up! It's not a big deal!
translation.zh: 我说了我会清理干净！ 不是什么大事！

translation.en: [Mom] What are you cleaning up? Did you have an accident?
translation.zh: 你在清理什么？发生什么意外了吗？

translation.en: [Hubie] No! It wasn't an accident.
translation.zh: 没有！不是意外

translation.en: [Mom] It was on purpose?
translation.zh: 那是故意的？

translation.en: [Hubie] Mom!
translation.zh: 妈妈！

translation.en: [Violet] Okay, kids, you can't have candy for breakfast,
translation.zh: 好了 孩子们 早餐不能吃糖

translation.en: but you can sprinkle some on top of your cereal.
translation.zh: 但是可以在谷物里面撒一点

translation.en: -[girl 1] Yes! -[girl 2] Oh, yeah!
translation.zh: -耶！ -太好了！

translation.en: Welcome back. You're Watching Wake Up Boston.
translation.zh: 欢迎回来 大家正在收看的是《早安波士顿》

translation.en: And it's October 31st, which is a special day across the country,
translation.zh: 今天是10月31日 是整个国家的特别日子

translation.en: but most especially in Salem, America's unofficial Halloween capital.
translation.zh: 但尤其是在塞勒姆 美国非官方认证的万圣节首都

translation.en: And it's gonna be a great day in Salem. Right, Jenna Thomas?
translation.zh: 塞勒姆的一天会非常好 对吧 詹娜·托马斯？

translation.en: Yes, Erin. Clear and a balmy 61 degrees.
translation.zh: 是的 艾琳 晴朗温暖的16度

translation.en: Ready for trick-or-treating and all the spooky stuff.
translation.zh: 准备好今天的“不给糖就捣蛋”游戏 和各种恐怖的东西

translation.en: Ooh! Get that candy, kids.
translation.zh: 孩子们 去要糖吧

translation.en: And now, Wake Up Boston's Tracy Phillips is live with the Mayor of Salem,
translation.zh: 现在《早安波士顿》的特雷西· 菲利普斯直播对话塞勒姆市长

translation.en: David Benson, and-- Tracy, you went with Harley Quinn, too?
translation.zh: 大卫·本森 与… 特雷西 你也打扮成了“小丑女”？

translation.en: Sure did, Erin.
translation.zh: 当然了 艾琳

translation.en: Only one day a year you get to show your ex what he's missin'.
translation.zh: 毕竟一年只有一天 肯定向前任展示 他错过了什么

translation.en: Hey!
translation.zh: 嘿！

translation.en: You know it. Ooh! Ooh!
translation.zh: 你懂的

translation.en: -Ooh! Ooh! -Yeah!
translation.zh: 对！

translation.en: So, Mayor Benson, the sun sets in eight short hours,
translation.zh: 本森市长 马上还有八个小时 太阳就要落山了

translation.en: but the spooky preparations are in full swing around here.
translation.zh: 但是恐怖东西的准备 还在这里如火如荼地进行着

translation.en: Indeed it is, Tracy.
translation.zh: 确实是的 特雷西

translation.en: As you can see, we're already setting up our world-famous Halloween parade.
translation.zh: 大家可以看到 我们已经在准备 世界著名的万圣节花车游行了

translation.en: And a few blocks over, we got a street fair.
translation.zh: 几个街区之外 我们有一个市集

translation.en: And you're expecting some pretty impressive crowds here this evening.
translation.zh: 今晚能看到漂亮又震撼的人群

translation.en: Oh, we're expecting over 70,000 people to visit Salem this evening.
translation.zh: 今天晚上 我们有七万人要来塞勒姆拜访

translation.en: Well, I know where I'm gonna be tonight. Reporting from Salem, Tracy Phillips.
translation.zh: 我今天晚上有好去处了 特雷西·菲利普斯 塞勒姆报道

translation.en: -Back to you, Erin. -[marching band playing]
translation.zh: 回到演播室 艾琳

translation.en: -[Steve] Is this the way you found him? -[man] Yeah.
translation.zh: -你就是这么找到它的？ -对

translation.en: And I was gonna take poor Peanut
translation.zh: 我打算今晚的带可怜的花生

translation.en: to the Halloween Carnival tonight for the petting zoo.
translation.zh: 去万圣节嘉年华 参加允许孩子们摸的动物园

translation.en: But what kid would wanna pet a pig that look like that?
translation.zh: 但是哪有孩子会想要摸 长成那样的猪啊？

translation.en: Did you hear anything or see anything unusual last night?
translation.zh: 你昨晚听到什么了吗？ 或者有什么异常声音？

translation.en: Well, I woke up 'cause the animals sounded agitated,
translation.zh: 我起来了 因为动物们的声音听起来有点焦虑

translation.en: and then I heard poor Peanut make a God-awful squeal.
translation.zh: 然后我听到可怜的花生 特别惊恐地大叫

translation.en: Squealin' like he was callin' for his daddy!
translation.zh: 惊恐得 好像在喊它爸爸！

translation.en: You know what I think done it?
translation.zh: 你知道我认为是谁干的吗？

translation.en: A werewolf.
translation.zh: 是狼人

translation.en: Think you've been watching too many scary movies, Louise.
translation.zh: 我觉得你看太多恐怖电影了 路易

translation.en: And I think you've been eating too many of your own boogers, Dan.
translation.zh: 我觉得你吃太多自己的鼻屎了 丹

translation.en: Oh, at least my mama don't stink the toilet up so bad,
translation.zh: 至少我妈妈不会把厕所弄那么臭

translation.en: we gotta get rid of the shower curtain.
translation.zh: 臭到我们直接扔掉了浴帘

translation.en: Oh, you gonna bring up my mama in front of the police, huh?
translation.zh: 你非要在警察面前提我妈妈 是吧？

translation.en: Ain't nobody say nothin' 'bout your big-ass mama.
translation.zh: 别人还没说你那个肥妈妈呢

translation.en: She come in the house and broke all the furniture.
translation.zh: 她进来房子 弄坏了所有家具

translation.en: My mom wouldn't break up the furniture
translation.zh: 如果不是你从宜家买便宜货

translation.en: if you hadn't bought that cheap Ikea stuff and put it together with a butter knife!
translation.zh: 然后用抹黄油的刀组装 我妈妈就不会弄坏家具了

translation.en: Well, if I had a real man, then I wouldn't have to do it myself now, would I?
translation.zh: 如果我家有真男人 我就不用自己动手了 不是吗？

translation.en: [Dan] Peanut's dead!
translation.zh: 花生死了！

translation.en: We gonna eat Peanut tonight!
translation.zh: 我们今晚就吃掉花生！

translation.en: [man] Look at these nerds.
translation.zh: 看看这些呆子

translation.en: Unbelievable. You can say a lot of things about me, I was never a nerd.
translation.zh: 难以置信 你可以给我取很多绰号 但我绝对不是呆子

translation.en: Hey, pimples!
translation.zh: 嗨 小粉刺！

translation.en: Pubie!
translation.zh: 怂逼！

translation.en: Pubie? Uh, who's-- who's Pubie?
translation.zh: 怂逼？谁是怂逼？

translation.en: You are, Pubie. Landolfa called you that yesterday.
translation.zh: 你是 怂逼 兰道尔法昨天这样叫你的

translation.en: Hilarious.
translation.zh: 好搞笑

translation.en: Janitor, some drunk guy dressed as Captain Underpants
translation.zh: 杰内特 几个人喝多了 打扮成内裤超人的样子

translation.en: just threw up in the jail exhibit.
translation.zh: 刚刚在监狱主题展览吐了

translation.en: That's my cue. Call me if you get lonely, Violet.
translation.zh: 我该走了 维奥蕾特 如果你感到孤独了 给我打电话

translation.en: Don't call me.
translation.zh: 你别给我打电话

translation.en: Wasn't plannin' on it. Hey, Dot.
translation.zh: 我没有这个打算 喂 多特

translation.en: So, I saw there were massive lines out front.
translation.zh: 我看到外面排着长队

translation.en: I took the liberty to print up some happy Halloween word searches.
translation.zh: 我就自作主张 印了一些万圣节快乐的搜索词汇

translation.en: You can pass it out to the kids.
translation.zh: 可以把这个发给孩子们

translation.en: Give them something to do while they're waiting.
translation.zh: 给他们等待的时候找点事做

translation.en: Oh, Hubie, how lovely.
translation.zh: 修比 好贴心

translation.en: Thank you so much.
translation.zh: 太感谢了

translation.en: Of course.
translation.zh: 没事

translation.en: So, Violet Valentine.
translation.zh: 维奥蕾特·瓦伦丁

translation.en: Good to see you. Happy Halloween.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你 万圣节快乐

translation.en: -Thank you. -What brings you here?
translation.zh: -谢谢 -你怎么来了？

translation.en: I am chaperoning my daughter's field trip.
translation.zh: 我来陪我女儿参加秋游

translation.en: She's over there. Danielle! Danielle!
translation.zh: 她就在那边 黛妮尔！

translation.en: Say hello to Hubie.
translation.zh: 跟修比问好

translation.en: Hi, Hubie. What school do you go to?
translation.zh: 嗨 修比 你读哪所学校？

translation.en: No. He's a grown man. I've known him since kindergarten.
translation.zh: 不是 他是成年人 我从幼儿园就认识他了

translation.en: Yes. We had Miss Colestice's class together.
translation.zh: 对 我们一起上克雷斯蒂老师的课

translation.en: -Yes, we did. -You were the first kid to get earrings.
translation.zh: -是的 -你是第一个戴耳环的孩子

translation.en: [chuckles] I was.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry. I just thought 'cause of the thermos.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我以为你是学生 因为你拿了一个保温杯

translation.en: Oh, why? Do you want some soup?
translation.zh: 怎么了？你想喝点汤吗？

translation.en: -Uh, no, thanks. -Your friends?
translation.zh: -不用了 谢谢 -你的朋友们呢？

translation.en: All right. It's here if you want it.
translation.zh: 好 如果你们想要 随时找我

translation.en: -[laughing] What was that? -What was that about?
translation.zh: -这是干嘛？ -这是什么意思？

translation.en: What a nice young lady. I remember you just had a foster son.
translation.zh: 真是友善的小姑娘 我记得你有一个养子

translation.en: Yeah. Well, I've got two foster daughters now as well.
translation.zh: 对 我现在还有两个养女

translation.en: Huh. That's quite commendable.
translation.zh: 太难能可贵了

translation.en: Looking out for the community. That's important.
translation.zh: 照顾这里生活的人 太重要了

translation.en: Of course. That's my great-great-great-great-great grandmother.
translation.zh: 当然了 那是我的曾曾曾曾曾祖母

translation.en: She saw some bad things happening, but she spoke out.
translation.zh: 她看到有坏事发生 但她说出来了

translation.en: Said there's no such thing as witches.
translation.zh: 说根本没有女巫这种东西

translation.en: -Very brave. -Yeah, maybe too brave.
translation.zh: -好勇敢 -对 或许过于勇敢了

translation.en: 'Cause they called her a witch and ended up like this fella.
translation.zh: 因为他们管她叫女巫 后来就像这家伙一样

translation.en: -[Violet] Ooh. -[Hubie] The unfortunate dangling Dave.
translation.zh: 不幸悬挂的戴夫

translation.en: God, I love the way you phrase things.
translation.zh: 天啊 我喜欢你说话的方式

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: So, how are you and Officer Steve doing? I saw him yesterday in his squad car.
translation.zh: 你和史蒂夫警官怎么样了？ 我昨天在警车里看到他了

translation.en: We were talking shop. Penal code 10-4, 10-5. That kinda thing.
translation.zh: 我们聊了聊工作 你知道的 104法条 105法条那些

translation.en: Well, since we've been divorced four years,
translation.zh: 我们已经离婚四年了

translation.en: -I don't really know how he's doing. -Oh, well, don't lose faith.
translation.zh: -我不太清楚他最近怎么样 -别放弃信念

translation.en: You guys will get through this rough patch.
translation.zh: 你们能走过这个坎儿的

translation.en: Did you hear about the Andersons?
translation.zh: 听说安德森的事了吗？

translation.en: I met the fellow who moved into their home. A Walter Lambert.
translation.zh: 我见到了搬进他们家的人 沃特·兰伯特

translation.en: Seems like a decent guy.
translation.zh: 看样子是个正经人

translation.en: -[Violet] Walter Lambert? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -沃特·兰伯特？ -对

translation.en: There's a Walter Lambert buried right near my grandpa in the Pine Street Cemetery.
translation.zh: 我爷爷在松果街墓地埋葬的地方 旁边就埋了一个叫沃特·兰伯特的人

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: I only remember that name because there is something off about his tombstone.
translation.zh: 我记得这个名字 因为他的墓碑有些诡异

translation.en: -Off how? -Well, I know you, Hubie Dubois.
translation.zh: -怎么诡异了？ -我了解你 修比·杜布瓦

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -You'll see.
translation.zh: 你会知道的

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: ♪ Did you ever know That you're my hero? ♪
translation.zh: 你是否知道 你是我的英雄？

translation.en: ♪ And everything I'd like to be? ♪
translation.zh: 是我想成为的一切

translation.en: ♪ I could fly higher than an eagle ♪
translation.zh: 我可以比雄鹰飞得高

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause you are the wind Beneath my wings ♪
♪ Did you ever know That you're my hero? ♪
translation.zh: 你是否知道 你是我的英雄？

translation.en: ♪ You're everything, everything I wish I could be ♪
translation.zh: 是我想成为的一切

translation.en: ♪ I could fly higher than an eagle… ♪
translation.zh: 我可以比雄鹰飞得高 （沃特·兰伯特 儿子）

translation.en: What is that fool doing here?
translation.zh: 那个傻瓜在这里做什么呢？

translation.en: No clue.
translation.zh: 不知道

translation.en: -You want me to kick his ass, Father? -Not yet. But stay close.
translation.zh: -父亲 要让我教训他一顿吗？ -先不用 但是盯紧他

translation.en: That concludes our service.
translation.zh: 我们的仪式到此结束

translation.en: The family has invited you all to a luncheon.
translation.zh: 家属邀请你们所有人享用午宴

translation.en: A luncheon at the, uh, Captain's Table on Foster Street. Thank you.
translation.zh: 午宴在福斯特街上 “船长的餐桌” 谢谢

translation.en: He never died?
translation.zh: 他没死？

translation.en: Boobie! What are you doing?
translation.zh: 喂！你在做什么？

translation.en: Nothing. What are you doing?
translation.zh: 没什么 你在做什么？

translation.en: I'm officiating a funeral.
translation.zh: 我在主持一场葬礼

translation.en: On Halloween?
translation.zh: 在万圣节？

translation.en: People die every day, dummy. They don't skip holidays.
translation.zh: 哪一天都会有人死 蠢货 不分节假日

translation.en: -Even April Fool's Day? -Shut it.
translation.zh: -愚人节也是嘛？ -闭嘴

translation.en: And if you get dirt on my good funeral shoes again,
translation.zh: 如果你再让我的葬礼鞋粘上泥土

translation.en: I'm gonna bury one up your butt.
translation.zh: 我就埋了你

translation.en: Okay. You want some soup?
translation.zh: 好 你要喝点汤吗？

translation.en: No, I don't want some s--
translation.zh: 不 我不想喝你的…

translation.en: -Good to wash off the dirt. -Here, let me help you.
translation.zh: -很高兴能洗净灰尘 -来 让我帮你

translation.en: Oh, is this--
translation.zh: 这是…

translation.en: Condolences, by the way.
translation.zh: 节哀顺变

translation.en: And I love the Wicked Witch costume. It's classic.
translation.zh: 我喜欢这个坏女巫节日服装 很经典

translation.en: It's not a costume.
translation.zh: 这不是节日服装

translation.en: Not a costume? Okay. My boner.
translation.zh: 不是节日服装？好吧 我糗了

translation.en: [woman] Why he talk about his boner?
translation.zh: 他为什么要说他糗了？

translation.en: Hello, Hubes. What did you do wrong?
translation.zh: 你好 小修比 你做错什么了？

translation.en: I don't think anything.
translation.zh: 应该没有

translation.en: By the way, I wanted to say that I'm sorry
translation.zh: 对了 那天在熟食窗口的事

translation.en: for my attitude yesterday at the deli counter.
translation.zh: 我想为我的态度道歉

translation.en: [stammers] My dad, you know, he died unexpected,
translation.zh: 你也知道 我父亲突然意外去世

translation.en: and I just haven't been myself these past few days.
translation.zh: 我过去几天一直都不太像我自己

translation.en: This is your dad's funeral? I'm so sorry. I didn't--
translation.zh: 这是你父亲的葬礼？抱歉 我不知道…

translation.en: My father passed away a couple of years ago.
translation.zh: 我父亲几年前去世了

translation.en: It is very painful. It's--
translation.zh: 真的很痛苦 我…

translation.en: -Ups and downs, emotionally. -Yeah. My dad was a serious man.
translation.zh: -经历了情感上的过山车 -对 我父亲是个很正经的人

translation.en: He worked hard every single day of his life.
translation.zh: 他这一辈子 每天都在努力工作

translation.en: -But he did love to laugh. -Okay.
translation.zh: -但他确实很喜欢笑 -好

translation.en: And I know he would get a great chuckle out of this.
translation.zh: 我知道 他肯定会因为这个大笑的

translation.en: Have fun, Pubes.
translation.zh: 玩得开心 小修比

translation.en: Ma! He's an idiota, deficiente!
translation.zh: 妈妈！他就是个蠢货 有病！

translation.en: Disrespectful?
translation.zh: 亵渎？

translation.en: No, this is good.
translation.zh: 不 这样很好

translation.en: We want him in the hole.
translation.zh: 我们想让他在那个洞里

translation.en: God would want this.
translation.zh: 上帝会想要这样的

translation.en: Somebody's down here!
translation.zh: 下面有人！

translation.en: Ah! The dead speak!
translation.zh: 死人说话了

translation.en: -[thuds] -[Hubie] Oh, my soup!
translation.zh: 我的汤！

translation.en: [Aurora on radio] It's not even dark yet here in Salem,
translation.zh: 塞勒姆还没有黑天

translation.en: but the spooky vibes are gettin' heavy, baby.
translation.zh: 但是恐怖的的气氛 已经开始浓重起来了 宝贝

translation.en: We'll get through it together here on…
translation.zh: 我们会一起面对 就在…

translation.en: ♪ WCC8 ♪
translation.zh: WCC8电台

translation.en: [woman, in a spooky voice] Halloween central.
translation.zh: 万圣节中心

translation.en: [Hubie] Mr. Lambert.
translation.zh: 兰伯特先生

translation.en: What are you up to?
translation.zh: 你在做什么？

translation.en: Hubie. Yeah.
translation.zh: 修比 嗯

translation.en: I wa--
translation.zh: 我在…

translation.en: Last night, I thought I felt a little draft. So…
translation.zh: 昨晚我感觉有一点漏风 所以…

translation.en: Yeah, that October wind will-- it'll sneak up on you.
translation.zh: 对 十月的风会… 偷偷钻进房间

translation.en: Sure does.
translation.zh: 确实是

translation.en: Say, Mr. Lambert.
translation.zh: 话说 兰伯特先生

translation.en: How old are you?
translation.zh: 你多大年纪？

translation.en: You mean in human years?
translation.zh: 你是说人类的年岁？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: I don't really believe in keeping track of that kind of thing, Hubie.
translation.zh: 我不太喜欢记着那种东西 修比

translation.en: You know, age is just a state of mind.
translation.zh: 你知道 年龄只是精神状态的象征

translation.en: That's why I played T-ball till I was 25.
translation.zh: 所以我25岁之前 一直玩儿童棒球

translation.en: Hubie Dubois.
translation.zh: 修比·杜布瓦

translation.en: I can't believe it's finally Halloween.
translation.zh: 我真不敢相信 终于到了万圣节

translation.en: My parents got me a royal princess dress from the Disney Store.
translation.zh: 我父母给我从迪士尼商店 买了一件漂亮的皇室公主裙

translation.en: -Cooky, what are you gonna dress up as? -A robot.
translation.zh: -库奇 你要打扮成什么？ -机器人

translation.en: You should go as a girl who doesn't even know who her real parents are.
translation.zh: 你应该打扮成一个 不知道自己亲生父母是谁的女孩

translation.en: Oh, that's who you are every day.
translation.zh: 对了 那就是你每天的样子

translation.en: [woman] O'Doyle!
translation.zh: 欧道尔

translation.en: -[pounds] -[Andy] Yes, Miss Taylor?
translation.zh: 是 泰勒老师？

translation.en: Maybe you should go as a butt-faced, red-haired piece of dog puke
translation.zh: 或许你应该打扮成一个丑陋的红头发 狗的呕吐物

translation.en: who's reading at a second-grade level even though he's 11.
translation.zh: 虽然已经11岁了 读书能力还停留在二年级水平

translation.en: [man] Attention, first through sixth graders.
translation.zh: 注意 六年级同学先来

translation.en: We have a special presentation today in lieu of recess.
translation.zh: 我们今天的课间 要进行一场特殊的展示

translation.en: Here again to talk about Halloween safety
translation.zh: 来这里讲万圣节安全的是

translation.en: is Salem's Official Volunteer Halloween Helper,
translation.zh: 塞勒姆的万圣节助手官方志愿者

translation.en: Hubert Dubois.
translation.zh: 修比尔特·杜布瓦

translation.en: Oh, God.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: [girl] Are those pee stains?
translation.zh: 那是尿的痕迹吗？

translation.en: Hello, Webster Elementary School.
translation.zh: 韦伯斯特小学的同学们 大家好

translation.en: I am not a ghost, but I play one on TV.
translation.zh: 我不是鬼 但我在电视上扮演鬼

translation.en: Just playing.
translation.zh: 扮演而已

translation.en: My name is Hubie Dubois, and I am here to tell you that Halloween is fun,
translation.zh: 我的名字叫修比·杜布瓦 我 在这里想告诉大家 万圣节是有趣的

translation.en: but we must stay out of the danger zone.
translation.zh: 但我们必须远离危险区域

translation.en: Hey! Hey! Hey!
translation.zh: 喂！

translation.en: Let him speak. He's a human being!
translation.zh: 让他说话 他是人类！

translation.en: Thank you, sir. I would like a word with you all.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 先生 我想跟你们所有人说句话

translation.en: And that word is…
translation.zh: 这句话是…

translation.en: G-ghost?
translation.zh: “戈…威” 鬼？

translation.en: Ghost. Scary. But also the key to Halloween safety.
translation.zh: 鬼 恐怖 也是万圣节安全的关键

translation.en: The G.
translation.zh: 第一个字母

translation.en: -What could the G stand for? -Go home?
translation.zh: -第一个字母代表什么？ -回家？

translation.en: No. Give.
translation.zh: 不 给予

translation.en: Give to the less fortunate. Does anyone know what less fortunate is?
translation.zh: 给予那些贫困的人 有人知道贫困是什么意思吗？

translation.en: -Yes, sir. -It means someone who needs help.
translation.zh: -是 你回答 -意思是 需要帮助的人

translation.en: Very good. What's your name?
translation.zh: 非常好 你叫什么名字？

translation.en: -Cooky. -Well, you're a smart cookie.
translation.zh: -库奇 -你是很聪明的库奇

translation.en: When I was young, I used to build a tower with all my candy.
translation.zh: 我小时候 会用我所有的糖堆一个塔

translation.en: And all the candy that was part of the tower before it collapsed,
translation.zh: 在塔倒塌前 所有组成塔的糖

translation.en: I would keep for myself.
translation.zh: 我会自己留着

translation.en: The leftover candy, I would donate to the homeless shelter.
translation.zh: 剩下的糖 我会捐献给收容中心

translation.en: Is that where you live?
translation.zh: 你住在那里吗？

translation.en: Well, son--
translation.zh: 孩子…

translation.en: Burn him!
translation.zh: 烧了他！

translation.en: I'm sorry, son. I just--
translation.zh: 对不起 孩子 我只是…

translation.en: Please-- please don't cry.
translation.zh: 请你不要哭

translation.en: I feel bad for him.
translation.zh: 我很同情他

translation.en: Yeah. No, baby. He overstayed his welcome.
translation.zh: 对 没事 宝贝 他讲话太久了

translation.en: We're out of food, I guess. Yeah?
translation.zh: 你们手里没食物了吧？

translation.en: Hey. What can I get you guys?
translation.zh: 嘿 你们要什么？

translation.en: Hi. Can I get a black coffee?
translation.zh: 嗨 一杯黑咖啡

translation.en: Coffee?
translation.zh: 咖啡？

translation.en: -Not hot chocolate? -Oh, I don't drink hot chocolate anymore.
translation.zh: -不要热巧克力？ -不 我不再喝热巧克力了

translation.en: -You had one this morning. -Well, I quit.
translation.zh: -你今天早上喝了 -对 我戒了

translation.en: Okay. Well, I'm gonna need to see some ID, freshman.
translation.zh: 好 我需要看一下你的身份证 新生

translation.en: [stammers] ID? I don't…
translation.zh: 身份证？我又没…

translation.en: [chuckles] I'm just kidding. One black coffee.
translation.zh: 我开玩笑的 一杯黑咖啡

translation.en: So, how'd you know I was a freshman?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道我是新生？

translation.en: Oh, I see you in the hallways
translation.zh: 我在走廊里看到你了

translation.en: and it's pretty obvious. What are you guys doing for Halloween?
translation.zh: 很明显 你们万圣节做什么？

translation.en: Well, I'm taking my sisters trick-or-treating.
translation.zh: 要带妹妹们玩 “不给糖就捣蛋”游戏

translation.en: And my mom's at work, so I kind of run the house when she's gone.
translation.zh: 我妈妈工作 所以她不在的时候 我要好好看家

translation.en: -So, you're not going to the party? -Yeah, I'm going.
translation.zh: -那你不去派对？ -我去

translation.en: -Which party? -One manly black coffee.
translation.zh: -哪个派对？ -一杯有男子气概的黑咖啡

translation.en: That's me.
translation.zh: 是我的

translation.en: The big barn at Wallace Orchard. It's mostly juniors and seniors.
translation.zh: 在华雷斯果园的谷仓 多数都是二、三年级学生

translation.en: Hmm. Yeah. Well, maybe after my mom comes home, I'll-- I'll try to swing by.
translation.zh: 好 或许等我妈妈回家后 我试试过去看看

translation.en: Try hard.
translation.zh: 努力试试

translation.en: Did you suddenly get cool?
translation.zh: 你突然耍酷了吗？

translation.en: Sorry, freshman.
translation.zh: 抱歉 新生

translation.en: Michael Mundi in the house!
translation.zh: 迈克尔·蒙迪来了！

translation.en: It comes and goes.
translation.zh: 人气都是一时的

translation.en: [Aurora on radio] Well, all you witches and warlocks, the daylight is fading,
translation.zh: 各位女巫和术士们 日光正在退去

translation.en: and you know what that means. Halloween in Salem is in full effect.
translation.zh: 你们知道这意味着什么 塞勒姆的万圣节全面开启

translation.en: Now, we have an old friend on the line, Hubie Dubie.
translation.zh: 我们连接了一位老朋友 修比·杜布瓦

translation.en: [echoing] Hi, I like-- I wanna make a request, please?
translation.zh: 你好 我想… 我有一个请求

translation.en: If you can play the theme song
translation.zh: 能不能播放《捉鬼敢死队》

translation.en: from the film Ghostbusters by Ray Parker Jr.
translation.zh: 小雷·帕克唱的主题曲

translation.en: [Aurora] Hubie, you need to turn down your radio.
translation.zh: 修比 你需要关掉收音机

translation.en: -We talked about this before. -[echoing] I just keep hearing myself.
translation.zh: -我们之前说过 -我一直能听到自己的声音

translation.en: -[Aurora] Hubie. -Okay, there it is.
translation.zh: -修比 -好 听到了

translation.en: Thank you, Aurora.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 欧若拉

translation.en: -[Aurora] Turn down the radio. -["Ghostbusters" playing]
translation.zh: 关掉收音机

translation.en: [echoing] Who is that?
translation.zh: 你是谁啊？

translation.en: -[Aurora] Just hang up your phone. -[echoing] Please stop.
translation.zh: -挂断电话 -别说话了

translation.en: -That's not funny. -[Aurora] All good, baby, okay?
translation.zh: -一点都不好笑 -一切都好 好吗？

translation.en: -[Aurora] Thanks for calling. -[Hubie] Sit on it, pal.
translation.zh: -感谢来电 -放上面 朋友

translation.en: That man on the radio sounds like the guy who talked to us in the cafeteria today.
translation.zh: 那个人听起来 像今天在餐厅给我们讲话的人呢

translation.en: Oh, did you get a Hubie Dubois Halloween safety talk?
translation.zh: 你们听修比·杜布瓦 关于安全的演讲了？

translation.en: I think so. Is he a good guy?
translation.zh: 也应该是 他是个好人吗？

translation.en: 'Cause the whole school was throwing food and sharp objects at him.
translation.zh: 因为整个学校都在往他身上 扔食物和尖锐的物品

translation.en: Hubie Dubois is probably the nicest guy in this town.
translation.zh: 修比·杜布瓦可能是 这个城市最善良的人

translation.en: Do you like him?
translation.zh: 你喜欢他吗？

translation.en: No. He-- You know, he's just--
translation.zh: 不 他… 你知道 他只是…

translation.en: -He's the nicest. -You said this already.
translation.zh: -他最善良 -你说过了

translation.en: Well, take it from me. Nice matters.
translation.zh: 相信我 善良非常重要

translation.en: [Aurora] The scariest night of the year has arrived, kiddies.
translation.zh: 孩子们 一年中最恐怖的夜晚来了

translation.en: It's gonna be a full moon, so the monsters will be out.
translation.zh: 今晚会是满月 所以怪物会跑出来

translation.en: I hope you've made all the necessary preparations.
translation.zh: 希望你做好了所有必须的准备

translation.en: And have your costumes all picked out.
translation.zh: 选好了你们的服装

translation.en: And watch out for all kinds of freaky things
translation.zh: 小心各种奇怪的东西

translation.en: that'll chill you to the bone.
translation.zh: 会把你吓到毛骨悚然

translation.en: Oh, Hubie. Don't go out there tonight.
translation.zh: 嗨 修比 今晚别出去

translation.en: I have a feeling something's going to happen.
translation.zh: 我有一种预感 会发生什么事

translation.en: I get that feeling every time I leave the house, Mom.
translation.zh: 我每次离开家 都有这种预感 妈

translation.en: But Salem needs me.
translation.zh: 但是塞勒姆需要我

translation.en: Listen to me. It's time to worry about yourself.
translation.zh: 听我说 是时候该担心你自己了

translation.en: Hubert Shubert Dubois, do you hear me?
translation.zh: 修比尔特·舒伯特·杜布瓦 你听到我说话了吗？

translation.en: The whole neighborhood'll hear you, Ma. You're practically screaming.
translation.zh: 整个街区都听到你了 妈 你就是在喊啊

translation.en: I'll be okay.
translation.zh: 我不会有事的

translation.en: -My sweet boy. -[Hubie] I love you.
translation.zh: -我的乖儿子 -我爱你

translation.en: Answer the door if it's a trick-or-treater.
translation.zh: 如果是来要糖的 记得开门

translation.en: Otherwise, just stay in the house, Ma.
translation.zh: 如果不是 就留在房子里 妈

translation.en: So, you went with the full moon, huh, God?
translation.zh: 你和满月一起玩呢 上帝？

translation.en: It's on.
translation.zh: 游戏开始

translation.en: [Hubie] Be careful, guys! Safety first!
translation.zh: 小心 各位！安全第一！

translation.en: -Incredible costumes, guys. -[girl] Whatever.
translation.zh: -好棒的服装 各位 -随便

translation.en: Well, not on my watch, Mr. Whiskers.
translation.zh: 威斯克先生 在我的监视下 一切安好

translation.en: Hey, Pubie! Give me back my cat!
translation.zh: 嗨 怂逼！把我的猫还给我

translation.en: Boy, that nickname spread like warm peanut butter.
translation.zh: 天啊 这个绰号真是一传十 十传百

translation.en: [Violet] Hey, Karen.
translation.zh: 嗨 凯伦

translation.en: How 'bout you thank the man?
translation.zh: 你应该谢谢他

translation.en: Oh, hey, Violet.
translation.zh: 嗨 维奥蕾特

translation.en: Oh, you fostering this mumbling zombie now, too? [laughs]
translation.zh: 你现在也领养 这个喃喃自语的僵尸了？

translation.en: Good luck!
translation.zh: 祝你好运！

translation.en: You want me to get out this car and beat you with that ugly cat?
translation.zh: 你想让我下车 把你和那只丑猫打一顿吗？

translation.en: 'Cause you know I'm more than capable of it.
translation.zh: 因为你知道 我想做这个 轻而易举

translation.en: Uh… no.
translation.zh: 不用

translation.en: Violet Valentine. What a, uh, pleasant surprise.
translation.zh: 维奥蕾特·瓦伦丁 真是愉快的惊喜

translation.en: How did you get to be so badass?
translation.zh: 你怎么就变成了坏蛋呢？

translation.en: Yes, you, Hubie. You're a stud.
translation.zh: 对 就是你 修比 你很迷人啊

translation.en: You're most friendly, most popular, and best looking.
translation.zh: 你曾是最友好、最受欢迎、最漂亮

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: I was wondering, Violet, do you think perhaps that we can--
translation.zh: 维奥蕾特 我想问你 你觉得或许我们可以…

translation.en: Maybe sometime you and I could possibly…
translation.zh: 或许你和我可以找个时间…

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Nothing.
translation.zh: 没什么

translation.en: Nothing at all.
translation.zh: 什么都没有

translation.en: Okay. Well, I know it's your big night, Hubie.
translation.zh: 好 修比 我知道今晚你会很忙

translation.en: So, if you run out of soup and you need a refill, just stop by the diner.
translation.zh: 如果你的汤喝完了 需要添加 来我们晚餐店

translation.en: I'm working all night, okay?
translation.zh: 我会彻夜工作 好吗？

translation.en: Right-o.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: I'm asexual, but that girl's making me hella horny.
translation.zh: 我有性冷淡 但是那个女孩让我好饥渴

translation.en: Go, go, go.
translation.zh: 去吧

translation.en: Go get candy, baby.
translation.zh: 去要糖吧 宝贝

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: I'm gonna stop you there, young lady.
translation.zh: 我要制止你了 小姑娘

translation.en: Part of the fun of Halloween is its ways of teaching us life lessons.
translation.zh: 万圣节的一个乐趣 就是它怎样教会我们人生道理

translation.en: -To trust the honor system. -[animatronic creature] Hello!
translation.zh: -相信荣誉制度 -你好！

translation.en: [Hubie] Help me!
translation.zh: 救命！

translation.en: [laughs] You're a dummy!
translation.zh: 笨蛋！

translation.en: Scooby Dubois on the case!
translation.zh: 史酷比·杜布瓦查案！

translation.en: Mr. Hennessy. How's night school?
translation.zh: 轩尼斯先生 夜校怎么样？

translation.en: I dropped out three years ago. Shut up.
translation.zh: 我三年前就退校了 闭嘴

translation.en: [Hennessy] Hi, David. Hi, Tracy.
translation.zh: 你们好 大卫 特雷西

translation.en: -[Tracy] Hi. -[David] How are ya?
translation.zh: -嗨 -你好吗？

translation.en: Hubie, nice little sash you got on there. What is that, monitor?
translation.zh: 修比 你这个绶带不错啊 那是什么？“监督”？

translation.en: What're you monitorizing?
translation.zh: 你在监督什么？

translation.en: You see, basically, doing a door-to-door candy etiquette.
translation.zh: 你看 基本就是一家一家拜访的礼仪

translation.en: As a trained volunteer, I've been asked to initiate spot checks.
translation.zh: 作为受过训练的志愿者 他们求我进行抽查

translation.en: -Asked by who? -[Hennessy] Yeah.
translation.zh: -谁让你抽查的？ -对

translation.en: It looks like you made that sash from one of your mother's scarves.
translation.zh: 因为感觉你这个绶带 是你妈妈的旧围巾做的

translation.en: My family's been a part of Salem for, uh, going back to the witch trials.
translation.zh: 我们家族扎根在塞勒姆 从17世纪末就开始了

translation.en: So, I know what it's like when the spooky fun gets outta hand--
translation.zh: 所以恐怖的乐趣变味失控的时候 我能感觉到

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: I had this nightmare I was talking to an idiot.
translation.zh: 我做了一个噩梦 梦里和一个蠢货聊天

translation.en: Mmm. Havin' a nightmare about your hairdo.
translation.zh: 做了关于你发型的噩梦

translation.en: [Tracy and David] Come on, baby.
translation.zh: -走 宝贝 -走 宝贝

translation.en: [Hubie] Good night. Please keep the fishnets for fishing next year.
translation.zh: 晚安 你们把渔网留着明年捕鱼

translation.en: You know what spooky fun is really getting outta hand?
translation.zh: 你知道什么恐怖的乐趣 真正变味失控了吗？

translation.en: It's your new neighbor's house.
translation.zh: 是你新邻居的房子

translation.en: I heard some odd noises when I was walking by.
translation.zh: 我路过的时候 听到了奇怪的噪声

translation.en: -Noises, huh? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -噪声吗？ -对

translation.en: Let's break this down. Did it sound like this?
translation.zh: 我们来慢慢分析 听起来像这个声音吗？

translation.en: -That sounds like a donkey. No. -How about…
translation.zh: -这个听起来像驴 不是 -那这个呢…

translation.en: -No. -[squeaking]
translation.zh: 不是

translation.en: -No. -[grunting]
translation.zh: 不是

translation.en: I don't know. It was a noise!
translation.zh: 我不知道 就是噪声！

translation.en: -Okay? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -好吗？ -好

translation.en: -Why don't you just go see what it is? -On it.
translation.zh: -不如你自己去看看是什么？ -马上去

translation.en: [Hubie] Mr. Lambert? Mr. Lambert?
translation.zh: 兰伯特先生？

translation.en: Mr. Lambert?
translation.zh: 兰伯特先生？

translation.en: [Hubie] Hello?
translation.zh: 在吗？

translation.en: [Hubie] Mr. Lamb--
translation.zh: 兰伯特先…

translation.en: Why?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: What the--
translation.zh: 你这是…

translation.en: You got a dog, Mr. Lambert?
translation.zh: 你养狗吗 兰伯特先生？

translation.en: You got a big dog, Mr. Lambert?
translation.zh: 你养了一条大狗吗 兰伯特先生？

translation.en: Mr. Lambert.
translation.zh: 兰伯特先生

translation.en: I know you said if there was a commotion, I should ignore it.
translation.zh: 我知道你说过 如果有骚乱 我应该忽视

translation.en: But there was a commotion, and I did not ignore it. And--
translation.zh: 但确实有骚乱 我没有忽视 然后…

translation.en: Were those your feces on the newspaper, Mr. Lambert?
translation.zh: 那报纸上是你的屎吗 兰伯特先生？

translation.en: [rumbling, gasping] Walter.
translation.zh: 沃特

translation.en: Safe Halloween, Mr.--
translation.zh: 万圣节平安 沃特…

translation.en: Walter!
translation.zh: 先生

translation.en: Look, I know it was just a pig.
translation.zh: 是 我知道只是一头猪

translation.en: Peanut was not just a pig, officer. He was my best friend.
translation.zh: 花生不只是一头猪 警官 它是我最好的朋友

translation.en: -I thought I was your best friend. -[scoffs]
translation.zh: 我以为我是你最好的朋友

translation.en: Here's what I'm thinkin'. Name Richie Hartman ring a bell?
translation.zh: 我是这样想的 理查·哈特曼这个名字 你记得吗？

translation.en: Richie Hartman?
translation.zh: 理查·哈特曼？

translation.en: Everybody knows who he is.
translation.zh: 每个人都知道他是谁

translation.en: I don't. Who is he? One of your boyfriend?
translation.zh: 我不知道 他是谁？ 你的一个男朋友吗？

translation.en: [Louise] Oh, you jealous now?
translation.zh: 你现在吃醋了？

translation.en: Why don't you go cuddle up with your best friend, Peanut, huh?
translation.zh: 你怎么不去 拥抱你最好的朋友花生呢？

translation.en: [Dan crying] You see this, officer?
translation.zh: 你看到了 警官？

translation.en: -I wanna press charges. -Oh, you gotta be kidding me.
translation.zh: -我想起诉 -开什么玩笑

translation.en: [Louise] And I wanna press your face against that radiator!
translation.zh: 我想把你的脸按到那个暖气上！

translation.en: -[Hubie] Officer Steve! -I'm sorry, buddy.
translation.zh: -史蒂夫警官！ -抱歉 兄弟

translation.en: The package got by me. He moves quickly to the left.
translation.zh: 这个包裹直接越过我 快速向左转了

translation.en: Okay, well, how did the package even know that I was in here?
translation.zh: 好吧 这个包裹怎么知道 我在这里的呢？

translation.en: Well, that's a glass window. The package could see ya.
translation.zh: 这是玻璃窗 这个包裹还能看到你

translation.en: Yeah, but could've told the package that I'm a mannequin or somethin'.
translation.zh: 对 但你可以告诉这家伙 这里坐的是个假人之类的

translation.en: -You're right. -What is this package they talkin' about?
translation.zh: -你说得对 -他们说的包裹是什么？

translation.en: -My bad. -Guess they're talkin' about this fella.
translation.zh: -是我的错 -应该说的是这位朋友

translation.en: Pubie?
translation.zh: 怂逼？

translation.en: I don't know his name. The goofy idiot from the supermarket deli.
translation.zh: 我不知道他叫什么 超市熟食柜台那个蠢货

translation.en: Dan, Louise, let's table this discussion for a moment, okay?
translation.zh: 丹 路易 我们的谈话先推迟一下 好吗？

translation.en: -To be continued, I guess. -[Louise] Oh, you guess?
translation.zh: -我猜就要下次继续了吧 -你猜？

translation.en: I wish it was you that was knifed up instead of peanut.
translation.zh: 我真希望被刀子刺伤的是你 不是花生

translation.en: You hear this? Can I borrow your gun?
translation.zh: 你听到了吗？可以借你的枪吗？

translation.en: I assure you can arrest me right afterwards.
translation.zh: 我保证 你可以之后立刻逮捕我

translation.en: [Louise] Cut your gizzards off. That's what I should do.
translation.zh: 我最应该把你的蛋蛋切下来

translation.en: Officer Steve, I saw my ne--
translation.zh: 史蒂夫警官 我看到我的…

translation.en: Never mind that. Cop a squat.
translation.zh: 不用管 坐

translation.en: -Here? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -这里？ -对

translation.en: Hubie, how long have you lived in Salem?
translation.zh: 修比 你在塞勒姆生活多久了？

translation.en: Eh, my whole life.
translation.zh: 一辈子

translation.en: Now, you've brought us many instances of unlawful conduct
translation.zh: 你在这些年中 让很多次不法行为

translation.en: to our attention over the years.
translation.zh: 受到了我们的关注

translation.en: Somebody put a firecracker in my mail slot.
translation.zh: 有人在我信箱里放了爆竹

translation.en: There's a diaper in Dori's pond.
translation.zh: 多利的池塘中间有一个尿不湿

translation.en: There's a weird station wagon at the senior center.
translation.zh: 老年中心有一个奇怪的小旅行车

translation.en: The supermarket is selling expired bacon.
translation.zh: 超市在卖过期的培根

translation.en: Janet at the library has not been herself lately.
translation.zh: 图书管的詹内特最近表现很不像自己

translation.en: I heard a voice in the sewer.
translation.zh: 我听到下水道里有人的声音

translation.en: I'm sorry. I didn't recognize him.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我没认出来他

translation.en: The power of observation, the ability to blend in.
translation.zh: 观察的力量 融入的能力

translation.en: That is you in a nutshell, Hubie.
translation.zh: 修比 这就是你的总结

translation.en: Well, Steven, let's talk turkey.
translation.zh: 嗯 史蒂夫 这倒是事实

translation.en: May I?
translation.zh: 我可以拿一个吗？

translation.en: Mmm… I only have 30 left.
translation.zh: 我只剩下30个了

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: You ever hear of an AUU?
translation.zh: 你听说过AUU吗？

translation.en: I don't have an Internet, so I'm not up on my latest abbreviations.
translation.zh: 我家没有网络 我对最近的流行用语不了解

translation.en: Illuminate me.
translation.zh: 给我讲讲

translation.en: AUU stands for "Auxiliary Undercover Unit."
translation.zh: AUU代表“秘密辅助警察”

translation.en: -Now, before you get too excited, -[exhaling]
translation.zh: 你先别激动

translation.en: let me tell you what it entails, okay?
translation.zh: 让我告诉你它包含的责任 好吗？

translation.en: First off, there's no salary.
translation.zh: 首先 没有工资

translation.en: -[exhales] -There's no badge.
translation.zh: 没有警徽

translation.en: -[exhales] -We can't acknowledge you officially -in any way whatsoever. And-- -[exhaling]
translation.zh: 我们无法在官方 以任何方式承认你 然后…

translation.en: And the most important thing is
translation.zh: 最重要的是

translation.en: you can never be seen talking to me or any other officer in this place.
translation.zh: 你永远不能被别人看到和我 或者这个警局里的任何一个人讲话

translation.en: A question. How would I go about getting the information to you?
translation.zh: 我有问题 那我怎么传达信息给你？

translation.en: Oh, you just keep a log. A very detailed log.
translation.zh: 你写日志就行 一个非常详细的日志

translation.en: And you drop that log right here.
translation.zh: 把那个日志放在这里

translation.en: In the garbage can directly outside Town Hall.
translation.zh: 就在市政厅外面的垃圾箱里

translation.en: So, drop a log in a garbage can?
translation.zh: 把日志扔到垃圾箱？

translation.en: Well, that garbage can, that's monitored, 24-7.
translation.zh: 那个垃圾箱是24小时受到监控的

translation.en: So, any intel that you have, it's gonna get to us. We'll know about it.
translation.zh: 所以你的任何信息 都会传达给我们 我们会知道

translation.en: -Makes-- makes sense. -Yep.
translation.zh: -行得通 -对

translation.en: But remember, you cannot contact us, no matter how dire the emergency.
translation.zh: 但是记住 不管是多么紧急的情况 你都不能联系我们

translation.en: -Yeah, I heard you the first time. -Yeah, I said it twice, it's important.
translation.zh: 是 我刚才已经听到你说了 好 我说两次 是因为很重要

translation.en: -Gotcha. -So, you ready to join the team?
translation.zh: -懂了 -你准备好加入团队了吗？

translation.en: Put me in, coach. I'm ready to play.
translation.zh: 让我加入 长官 我已经准备好开始工作了

translation.en: [Steve] All right!
translation.zh: 好！

translation.en: Perfect.
translation.zh: 完美

translation.en: Tommy, I want mom to bring half my candy to the homeless shelter in the morning.
translation.zh: 汤米 我想让妈妈把我一半的糖 在早上送到收容中心

translation.en: Will you tell her when she gets home?
translation.zh: 等她回家 你可以告诉她吗？

translation.en: Tommy?
translation.zh: 汤米？

translation.en: Tommy!
translation.zh: 汤米！

translation.en: Tommy?
translation.zh: 汤米？

translation.en: Tommy, where are you?
translation.zh: 汤米 你在哪里？

translation.en: Danielle! Mom isn't home yet, and I can't find Tommy. I'm scared.
translation.zh: 黛妮尔！妈妈还没有回来 我也找不到汤米 我好害怕

translation.en: -Did you check the basement? -I checked everywhere. He's not here.
translation.zh: -你看过地下室了吗？ -所有地方都看过了 他没在这里

translation.en: You know what that means? Our brother's in love.
translation.zh: 你知道这意味着什么吗？ 意味着我们哥哥坠入爱河了

translation.en: Ew!
translation.zh: 恶心

translation.en: ♪ Ghosts and goblins very scary ♪
translation.zh: 妖魔鬼怪十分可怕

translation.en: ♪ Wolfman's back is very hairy… ♪
translation.zh: 狼人的后背长满毛发

translation.en: How we doin', ladies?
translation.zh: 女士们 你们好吗？

translation.en: Great, Freddie Mercury.
translation.zh: 很好 佛莱迪·摩克瑞

translation.en: So lit to have freshman girls here. New crop of hotties to hit on.
translation.zh: 这里有新生学妹 真是太酷了 有一批新的美女庄稼可以收割

translation.en: Hey! Easy, Mikey. My sister's a freshman.
translation.zh: 喂！别激动 迈克 我妹妹是新生

translation.en: Dude, I would never even consider your sister in that way.
translation.zh: 兄弟 我不会那样看待你妹妹

translation.en: She's got no personality and a greasy forehead.
translation.zh: 她没有个性 额头油腻腻

translation.en: You're a good friend, man.
translation.zh: 你真是个好朋友 兄弟

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: Didn't I see you on Union Street a couple of hours ago trick-or-treating?
translation.zh: 我是不是几个小时之前去要糖的时候 在联合街见过你？

translation.en: Well, I had to take out my two new sisters, remember?
translation.zh: 我要带着两个新妹妹去要糖 记得吗？

translation.en: I don't know. I thought I saw you hold open your bag to get some candy.
translation.zh: 好像不是吧 我记得看到你包口大开 要糖呢

translation.en: That's not babysitting, that's trick-or-treating.
translation.zh: 那可不是照顾妹妹 你就是在要糖

translation.en: Oh, my God. I know, I know. It's so pathetic.
translation.zh: 天啊 我知道 太可悲了

translation.en: It's not pathetic.
translation.zh: 并不可悲

translation.en: If you brought me a Kit Kat bar.
translation.zh: 如果你能给我拿一个奇巧威化

translation.en: Well, I have a few.
translation.zh: 我有几个

translation.en: ♪ Dancing with the Devil ♪
translation.zh: 与恶魔共舞

translation.en: -Excuse me. Smokers for chokers. -[glass shatters]
translation.zh: 打扰一下 吸烟让人窒息

translation.en: -What's your problem? -I got a problem?
translation.zh: -你有病吧？ -我有病？

translation.en: I think you got the problem.
translation.zh: 我认为你有病

translation.en: How we doing, guys?
translation.zh: 你们好吗 各位？

translation.en: -[man 1] What's up, old man? -Got some ID for that drink?
translation.zh: -你好 老头 -你喝那杯酒 有身份证吗？

translation.en: -What? -Yeah, not on my watch.
translation.zh: -什么？ -对 我看到了就不行

translation.en: -What the hell? -It's for the best.
translation.zh: -搞什么鬼？ -这样最好

translation.en: And I think we are gonna dehydrate. Let's break that up.
translation.zh: 你们要缺水了 先分开一下

translation.en: -Watch it, GI Jackass. -[man 2] You wanna die?
translation.zh: -小心点 混蛋督察队的 -你想死吗？

translation.en: Not yet.
translation.zh: 现在还不想

translation.en: Uh, excuse me, Grandpa Thermos, you need to leave the party right now.
translation.zh: 不好意思 保温杯老爷爷 你需要立刻离开派对

translation.en: Leave public property? I don't see that happening.
translation.zh: 离开这个公共场所？我不这样想

translation.en: Leave. Or I'll beat you with a tire iron.
translation.zh: 走 不然我就用轮胎扳手打你

translation.en: You and whose army?
translation.zh: 你和谁的军队？

translation.en: Just me.
translation.zh: 只有我

translation.en: -And me. -And me.
translation.zh: -还有我 -还有我

translation.en: -And me. -And definitely me.
translation.zh: -还有我 -绝对还有我

translation.en: -Let's kill him! -[all clamoring] Yeah! Yeah!
translation.zh: -我们杀了他！ -好！

translation.en: Hang on! All right.
translation.zh: 等一下！好

translation.en: I realize I might have gone too far for your teenage mental capacities
translation.zh: 我意识到我可能对你们 青少年的心里承受能力管太多了

translation.en: and that is a boner on my part.
translation.zh: 这是我的大糗

translation.en: -I don't think he knows what boner means. -No, definitely not.
translation.zh: -我觉得他好像不知道糗的意思 -肯定不知道

translation.en: When I was your age, I made some huge boners.
translation.zh: 我像你么这么大的时候 犯过几次大糗

translation.en: Boners that I wish I could get back now.
translation.zh: 那些糗 我现在非常希望回到过去

translation.en: Listen, give me a minute head start,
translation.zh: 听着 给我留一分钟时间

translation.en: then tell him there's a kid stuck in the corn maze.
translation.zh: 然后告诉他 有一个孩子困在玉米地迷宫里了

translation.en: And why am I doing that?
translation.zh: 我为什么要那样做？

translation.en: 'Cause I am going to scare the living crap out of him.
translation.zh: 因为我要吓死他

translation.en: Really? Does he scare easy?
translation.zh: 真的？他那么容易害怕吗？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Yes, he does.
translation.zh: 是的 他很胆小

translation.en: [Hubie] Actually, I had a good time with you guys after all.
translation.zh: 其实 不管怎样 我和你们相处的时间很愉快

translation.en: It was fun. Hope we do it again next year. Give a hoot, don't pollute.
translation.zh: 很开心 希望明年还可以再来 关心自然 远离污染

translation.en: -[coughs] Isn't that Woodsy the Owl? -No, he was Tootsie Pops.
translation.zh: -那不是猫头鹰伍德西说的吗？ -不 是猫头鹰糖

translation.en: Hey, Mr. Pubois.
translation.zh: 喂 屁布瓦先生

translation.en: -Dubois. -Dubois.
translation.zh: -杜布瓦 -杜布瓦

translation.en: I think I saw a little kid get lost in the Corn Maze.
translation.zh: 我好像看到一个孩子 在玉米地迷宫走丢了

translation.en: In the what?
translation.zh: 在什么里？

translation.en: I heard him scream, "Help!" Then he started crying.
translation.zh: 我听到他喊“救命” 然后他就开始哭

translation.en: My God, it's just-- it's just a little kid!
translation.zh: 天啊 他只是一个小孩子啊

translation.en: Okay. Handle your high.
translation.zh: 好 你先别激动

translation.en: I am a member of the AUU. This is what I was trained to do.
translation.zh: 我是AUU成员 我们接受训练 就是为了做这种事

translation.en: I think we're good!
translation.zh: 没人管我们啦！

translation.en: Messing with Shoobie Dubois. A Salem tradition.
translation.zh: 耍混蛋·杜布瓦 是塞勒姆的传统

translation.en: My grandma gave him his first titty-twister.
translation.zh: 我奶奶是第一个拧他乳头的人

translation.en: -What a bunch of jerks. -Should we go tell him it's a prank?
translation.zh: -真是一群混蛋 -我们应该告诉他 真是恶作剧吗？

translation.en: I knew I liked you, freshman. Come on.
translation.zh: 我就知道我喜欢你 新生 走吧

translation.en: Excuse me, excuse me, Bride of Skankenstein. Yeah, thank you.
translation.zh: 让一下 科学怪人的缺德新娘 好 谢谢

translation.en: If you can hear me, please call out so I can determine your whereabouts!
translation.zh: 如果你能听到我说话 你就大喊 好让我知道你在哪里

translation.en: Do not be fearful, little one!
translation.zh: 不用害怕 小家伙

translation.en: Announce yourself!
translation.zh: 发出一点声音！

translation.en: [girl] Hubie!
translation.zh: 修比！

translation.en: [Tommy] Mr. Dubois!
translation.zh: 杜布瓦先生！

translation.en: [girl] Hubie!
translation.zh: 修比！

translation.en: [Tommy] Hello!
translation.zh: 你好！

translation.en: -Where are you? -Should we split up?
translation.zh: -你在哪里？ -我们应该分开吗？

translation.en: I don't know. That sounds like a big boner.
translation.zh: 我不知道 听起来有点糗

translation.en: -What? -I'm just kidding.
translation.zh: -什么？ -我开玩笑的

translation.en: [Hubie] Is anyone out there? Sound off!
translation.zh: 这里有人吗？发出一点声音！

translation.en: Tonight's temperatures will dip below 28 degrees!
translation.zh: 今晚的气温将会下降到零下二度

translation.en: Your nervous system cannot handle that!
translation.zh: 你的神经系统承受不住的

translation.en: Sasquatch could not handle that!
translation.zh: 大脚野人承受不住的

translation.en: [girl] Mr. Dubois? Hello!
translation.zh: 杜布瓦先生？

translation.en: Hey, Tommy, hey!
translation.zh: 嗨 汤米 嗨！

translation.en: -Mr. Dubois! [screams] -[laughs]
translation.zh: 杜布瓦先生！

translation.en: What the hell, Mike? Why would you do that?
translation.zh: 什么鬼 迈克？你为什么这样？

translation.en: Hey, whoa! I'm sorry. Come on, I couldn't resist.
translation.zh: 哇！抱歉 拜托 我忍不住吓别人

translation.en: [Tommy] That wasn't cool, man.
translation.zh: 一点都不好玩 朋友

translation.en: Hey, coffee boy.
translation.zh: 嗨 咖啡男孩

translation.en: You're that freshman, right?
translation.zh: 你是那个新生 对吧？

translation.en: Uh, yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Yeah, well, welcome to your first high school fight.
translation.zh: 好 那欢迎你来到高中第一场打架

translation.en: [girl] Tommy!
translation.zh: 汤米！

translation.en: Megan McNally, you like underclassmen?
translation.zh: 梅根·麦克奈丽 你喜欢学弟？

translation.en: Oh, that's adorable.
translation.zh: 真是可爱

translation.en: [Hubie] Hello!
translation.zh: 有人吗？

translation.en: Is the fight over? Did I win?
translation.zh: 打架结束了吗？我赢了吗？

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. Yeah, you kicked his ass. Come on.
translation.zh: 对 你打败了他 走吧

translation.en: [Hubie] Is anyone out there? Sound off!
translation.zh: 这里有人吗？发出一点声音！

translation.en: [high-pitched voice] Help!
translation.zh: 救命！

translation.en: Remain in place! I will find you!
translation.zh: 待在原地别动！我过去找你！

translation.en: Not if I find you first! [snickers]
translation.zh: 如果我先找到你 就另当别论了

translation.en: Take me, evil one! Just do not harm the child!
translation.zh: 有本事来找我 坏人！ 不要伤害那个孩子！

translation.en: [high-pitched voice] Help, Hubie!
translation.zh: 救命 修比！

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不要！

translation.en: Dad? Is that you?
translation.zh: 爸爸？是你吗？

translation.en: Does Mom know you're still alive?
translation.zh: 妈妈知道你还活着吗？

translation.en: Are you still mad at me?
translation.zh: 你还生我的气吗？

translation.en: No. It's Tommy, Violet Valentine's son.
translation.zh: 不 我是汤米 维奥蕾特·瓦伦丁的儿子

translation.en: Yeah, and Megan. I work down at the coffee shop.
translation.zh: 对 我是梅根 我在街南的咖啡厅工作

translation.en: I give you free hot water for your dehydrated soup sometimes.
translation.zh: 我有时候会给你缺水的汤 加一杯免费热水

translation.en: Yes. Much appreciated.
translation.zh: 对 非常感谢

translation.en: The reason I take it for free is 'cause I don't have money.
translation.zh: 我免费拿的原因是我没有钱

translation.en: Anyway, we came over here to tell you that there's no lost kid.
translation.zh: 总之 我们过来 是想告诉你 这里没有走丢的孩子

translation.en: No one's lost?
translation.zh: 没有人走丢？

translation.en: Yeah, it's just Mike Mundi trying to pull a prank on you.
translation.zh: 对 是迈克·蒙迪想用恶作剧捉弄你

translation.en: Prank? No, I knew that.
translation.zh: 恶作剧？不 我知道

translation.en: So, I like the costumes.
translation.zh: 我很喜欢你们的服装

translation.en: -Garbage can? -Yeah. Tin Man.
translation.zh: -垃圾桶？ -对 我是铁皮人

translation.en: And Red Riding Hood.
translation.zh: 小红帽

translation.en: I want to be honest with you. Might not be a good year for it.
translation.zh: 我想对你说实话 今年可能对你不太好

translation.en: Um, between us, there is a man-wolf on the loose.
translation.zh: 这个我只告诉你 有一个狼人跑了

translation.en: Then maybe should I head inside?
translation.zh: 那我应该躲到室内吗？

translation.en: A wise decision.
translation.zh: 明智的决定

translation.en: By the way, my mom was talking about you tonight.
translation.zh: 对了 我妈妈今晚还提起你了

translation.en: Your mom was talking about me?
translation.zh: 你妈妈提起我了？

translation.en: What'd she say?
translation.zh: 她说什么了？

translation.en: Just that you are nice.
translation.zh: 说你很善良

translation.en: Well, I am nice.
translation.zh: 我确实很善良

translation.en: Because I'm not gonna tell her that you're out here playing Romeo
translation.zh: 因为我不会告诉她 你在外面扮演罗密欧

translation.en: instead of watching your two little sisters.
translation.zh: 没有照顾你的两个妹妹

translation.en: -Well, now I feel bad. -I know you feel bad.
translation.zh: -我现在有点自责了 -我知道你自责

translation.en: -'Cause you got a big heart. -Thanks.
translation.zh: -因为你铁皮人的心很大

translation.en: So, I'm gonna let you two guys take off without me.
translation.zh: 那么 我就让你们两个单独走了

translation.en: I'll give you a head start in the name of romance.
translation.zh: 我以浪漫的名义 让你先走

translation.en: -Okay. Go ahead, guys. Take care, now. -[Tommy] Thanks, Mr. Dubois.
translation.zh: -好 走吧 二位 保重 -谢谢你 杜布瓦先生

translation.en: -[Megan] Happy Halloween. -Not looking, guys!
translation.zh: -万圣节快乐 -我没看 二位

translation.en: Same corn over and over.
translation.zh: 到处都是玉米

translation.en: I should've left with the others, 'cause I have no idea where I am.
translation.zh: 我就应该和别人一起走 因为我现在不知道自己在哪里了

translation.en: So, I came from there. I already was there.
translation.zh: 我是从这里来的 这里已经来过了

translation.en: Can't believe I don't have a compass on my thermos.
translation.zh: 真不敢相信 我的保温杯上没有指南针

translation.en: [muffled screaming] Help me!
translation.zh: 救命！

translation.en: Michael Mundi.
translation.zh: 迈克尔·蒙迪

translation.en: [muffled screaming] Help me!
translation.zh: 救命！

translation.en: Listen, I am a fan of a Halloween zinger as much as the next guy, but…
translation.zh: 听着 我很喜欢万圣节惊喜 也很喜欢你 但是…

translation.en: What? What'd you say?
translation.zh: 什么？你说什么呢？

translation.en: Michael? Michael!
translation.zh: 迈克尔？迈克尔！

translation.en: What the--
translation.zh: 怎么…

translation.en: [screaming] What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: [Aurora] It's nine o'clock in Salem, which means all you trick-or-treaters
translation.zh: 塞勒姆现在是九点钟 也就是说 小朋友们要糖的游戏

translation.en: have counted up your candy corns and are gettin' ready for bed.
translation.zh: 已经计算清楚了 准备好要睡觉了

translation.en: What the heck?
translation.zh: 什么鬼？

translation.en: [Aurora] But that don't mean the fun stops for all of us.
translation.zh: （需要聊聊）

translation.en: -Hubie, I can't do this. -Michael Mundi was abducted.
translation.zh: -修比 我没有时间 -迈克尔·蒙迪被绑架了

translation.en: I found a ticket to the drive-in at the scene.
translation.zh: 我在现场找到了一张汽车影院的票

translation.en: Great. Start there.
translation.zh: 很好 从那里开始查

translation.en: [Aurora] So, now's the time for us big boys and girls to get up to some real mischief.
translation.zh: 现在轮到我们大男孩和大女孩 去搞点恶作剧了

translation.en: [Aurora] And watch out. It's always the quiet ones who get the most naughty.
translation.zh: 小心 咬人的狗通常不叫

translation.en: Violet, where the hell were you? We're falling behind out there.
translation.zh: 维奥蕾特 你去哪里了？ 我们这里都跟不上了

translation.en: Well, I was on the phone with the credit card company.
translation.zh: 我刚才在和信用卡公司通话

translation.en: They didn't know I had an extension. I'm so sorry, Mr. Tayback.
translation.zh: 他们不知道我延期了 我太抱歉了 泰白克先生

translation.en: You know how much credit card debt I'm in right now?
translation.zh: 你知道我现在 欠了多少信用卡欠款吗？

translation.en: Nobody gives a crap!
translation.zh: 没人在乎这个！

translation.en: Just do your job. No breaks on Halloween.
translation.zh: 做你的工作 万圣节不休息

translation.en: [female voice] Your call has been forwarded to an automated--
translation.zh: 您拨打的电话将转至自动…

translation.en: She's not answering.
translation.zh: 她不接电话

translation.en: Don't worry, we'll find Tommy.
translation.zh: 别担心 我们会找到汤米的

translation.en: I am your father, and I demand some respect.
translation.zh: 我是你父亲 你需要对我有点最起码的尊敬

translation.en: You are grounded for the next six months.
translation.zh: 你接下来六个月被禁足了

translation.en: You son of a--
translation.zh: 你这个混…

translation.en: -Mmm. Hey! -Hey.
translation.zh: -嗨 -嗨

translation.en: So, did I miss anything?
translation.zh: 我错过什么了吗？

translation.en: Yeah, you just missed the best part!
translation.zh: 你错过了最精彩的部分

translation.en: The best part is spending time alone with you.
translation.zh: 最精彩的部分 是和你单独相处

translation.en: Did that turn you on?
translation.zh: 有没有被勾起欲火？

translation.en: How is sucking on fake fingers supposed to turn me on?
translation.zh: 你舔假的手指 怎么可能让我勾起欲火？

translation.en: Well, imagine that they're your fingers.
translation.zh: 你可以想象 这是你的手指

translation.en: They're men's fingers. Are you saying I have men's fingers?
translation.zh: 那是男人的手指 你是说 我的手像男人吗？

translation.en: Okay, look, I was just trying something, okay?
translation.zh: 好吧 别生气 我只是想挑逗你一下 好吗？

translation.en: -Something different. -Jeez, man.
translation.zh: -想换点别的招数 -真烦

translation.en: [sighs] Remember we used to come here in high school?
translation.zh: 记得我们以前高中的时候来这里吗？

translation.en: Mm-hmm. Feels exactly the same, too. We got Hubie Dubois spying on everybody.
translation.zh: 感觉还和以前一样 还是有修比·杜布瓦监视着所有人

translation.en: I gotta say, it's pretty impressive how long he's been a loser.
translation.zh: 我不得不说 他做废物做了这么久 也是挺厉害的

translation.en: -I got a great idea. -[woman on-screen screaming]
translation.zh: 我有一个好主意

translation.en: It's kinda evil, but stick with me.
translation.zh: 有点邪恶 但是贴紧我

translation.en: Now, that turns me on.
translation.zh: 现在我勾起欲火了

translation.en: Michael Mundi.
translation.zh: 迈克尔·蒙迪

translation.en: Scheduled to come to the Creature Double Feature.
translation.zh: 本打算来看《双面生物》

translation.en: To meet who?
translation.zh: 要见谁呢？

translation.en: To kill his next victim?
translation.zh: 杀害他的下一个被害人？

translation.en: -[woman] Hubie. -[screaming] Murder!
translation.zh: 修比

translation.en: You okay, big man?
translation.zh: 你还好吗 大家伙？

translation.en: Mrs. Hennessy.
translation.zh: 轩尼斯太太

translation.en: I am actually doing a follow-up on a classified situation.
translation.zh: 我其实在追查一个经典的情况

translation.en: Did you lose your thermos or some shit?
translation.zh: 你丢了保温杯 还是什么东西？

translation.en: Oh, that'll never happen.
translation.zh: 那种事永远都不会发生的

translation.en: Anyway, I saw something earlier.
translation.zh: 总之 我刚才看到了一件事

translation.en: Something suspicious.
translation.zh: 一件可疑的事

translation.en: Ears are in open position.
translation.zh: 洗耳恭听

translation.en: This is gonna sound nuts.
translation.zh: 听起来会很疯狂

translation.en: But I was going to get popcorn earlier,
translation.zh: 但我刚才想买爆米花

translation.en: when this freaky old-timey car pulled into the lot.
translation.zh: 有一个奇怪的老车停在了停车场

translation.en: And the driver was--
translation.zh: 司机是…

translation.en: You just gotta see it to believe it.
translation.zh: 你要看到才能相信

translation.en: Could you possibly point me in the direction of this strange vehicle?
translation.zh: 你可以给我指一下 那辆奇怪的车的方位吗？

translation.en: It's that one.
translation.zh: 那辆

translation.en: Right there.
translation.zh: 就在那里

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Let's take a look.
translation.zh: 我过去看看

translation.en: -Oh, and, uh… -Yes?
translation.zh: -对了… -嗯？

translation.en: Hubie, do be… careful.
translation.zh: 修比 一定要…小心

translation.en: What the what?
translation.zh: 什么鬼啊？

translation.en: Okay, whoa, there.
translation.zh: 好吧 是你

translation.en: Step out of the vehicle!
translation.zh: 下车！

translation.en: We can do this the easy way or the paddle way. It's up to you.
translation.zh: 不要敬酒不吃吃罚酒 你自己选择

translation.en: Ghost!
translation.zh: 鬼！

translation.en: Help me!
translation.zh: 救命！

translation.en: What are you?
translation.zh: 你是谁？

translation.en: Help me!
translation.zh: 救命！

translation.en: No! Oh, God!
translation.zh: 天啊！

translation.en: Why?
translation.zh: 怎么回事？

translation.en: [kids shouting, clamoring] Get him!
translation.zh: 抓他！

translation.en: What the heck?
translation.zh: 搞什么鬼？

translation.en: [grunts] Help me!
translation.zh: 救我！

translation.en: -Now do you want me? -[Mrs. Hennessy] No!
translation.zh: -你现在想要我了吗？ -不要！

translation.en: [Hubie] There's a time and a place for hijinks!
translation.zh: 现在确实是搞恶作剧的时间和地点

translation.en: But there's a situation going on here!
translation.zh: 但是这里有情况！

translation.en: Hubie. It's funny seeing you here.
translation.zh: 修比 在这里看到你真搞笑

translation.en: I'm sorry about before. In the basement.
translation.zh: 之前地下室的事情 抱歉了

translation.en: I really wasn't feeling myself.
translation.zh: 我感觉不太像自己

translation.en: I don't know if I like you much better now.
translation.zh: 我好像现在也没有更喜欢你

translation.en: You didn't tell anybody about that, did you, Hubie?
translation.zh: 你没有告诉任何人吧 修比？

translation.en: Why? You have secrets, Mr. Lambert?
translation.zh: 怎么了？你有秘密 兰伯特先生？

translation.en: As in, secretly dropping by the corn maze earlier tonight?
translation.zh: 比如 刚才秘密到了玉米地迷宫？

translation.en: Did anybody get--
translation.zh: 有人受…

translation.en: -Mr. Lambert. -Walter.
translation.zh: -兰伯特先生 -沃特

translation.en: Your tombstone says that you have yet to die.
translation.zh: 你的墓碑说 你还没有死

translation.en: Are you a human being, or are you a moon-crazed beast
translation.zh: 你是人类 还是墓地里爬出来的

translation.en: from beyond the grave, grave, grave?
translation.zh: 见到月亮就变疯的野兽？

translation.en: Hold that thought! I gotta split!
translation.zh: 我一会儿再回答你 我要撕裂了！

translation.en: Mr. Lambert!
translation.zh: 兰伯特先生！

translation.en: That just answered my question.
translation.zh: 你已经回答了我的问题

translation.en: [male announcer] Oh, man. That's another one.
translation.zh: 天啊 又一个

translation.en: What a man! What a mouth! And on his first try.
translation.zh: 这个人真厉害！这张嘴真厉害！ 这还是他第一次尝试

translation.en: Have a round of applause, everyone.
translation.zh: 大家掌声鼓励

translation.en: Who's next?
translation.zh: 谁是下一个？

translation.en: If the mayor can do it, so can you.
translation.zh: 如果市长能做 你们也能做

translation.en: You, sir! Step on up.
translation.zh: 你 先生！请上来

translation.en: Sorry to bother you, mayor, but it's important.
translation.zh: 抱歉打扰你 市长 但是这很重要

translation.en: What is it, Sergeant?
translation.zh: 什么事 警佐？

translation.en: About an hour ago, I got a strange report
translation.zh: 约一小时之前 我接到了奇怪的报告

translation.en: of a missing high school kid from Hubie Dubois.
translation.zh: 修比·杜布瓦报告 一个高中生失踪了

translation.en: After I laughed it off as usual, I got a call from the kid's mother.
translation.zh: 我像平常那样一笑而过之后 我接到了孩子妈妈的电话

translation.en: He actually never made it home.
translation.zh: 他根本没回家

translation.en: This Richard Hartman thing has got you jumpy as hell.
translation.zh: 这个理查德·哈特曼的事情 让你变得这么疑神疑鬼

translation.en: I suggest we cancel the fireworks show immediately.
translation.zh: 我建议我们立刻取消烟花表演

translation.en: We ain't canceling a damn thing, Sergeant.
translation.zh: 我们什么都不会取消 警佐

translation.en: We got an unsolved mystery!
translation.zh: 这里有一个未解之谜呢

translation.en: Eighty-five percent of the tourism dollars spent in this town are spent on Halloween night.
translation.zh: 这个城市85%的游客消费 都花在万圣节上

translation.en: And I'm not gonna let no high school peckerhead jeopardize that.
translation.zh: 我才不会让 一个高中的毛头小子毁掉一切

translation.en: -I just think that-- -Trick-or-treat, smell my feet.
translation.zh: -我只是想… -不给糖就捣蛋 请你快点滚蛋

translation.en: -I just think that you're not-- -Smell my feet.
translation.zh: -我觉得我们不应该… -请你快点滚蛋

translation.en: -I just think that-- -Smell my feet.
translation.zh: -我觉得… -请你快点滚蛋

translation.en: You really want me to smell them?
translation.zh: 你真的要我滚你的蛋？

translation.en: Let's just go back, Danielle.
translation.zh: 我们还是回去吧 黛妮尔

translation.en: I don't want Mom to get home and see that Tommy left us by ourselves.
translation.zh: 我不想让妈妈到家之后 发现汤米不管我们两个 自己走掉了

translation.en: I think we'll all get in really big trouble for that.
translation.zh: 我觉得那样我们都会惹上大麻烦的

translation.en: Are we even going the right way?
translation.zh: 我们走的路对吗？

translation.en: Excuse me, sir?
translation.zh: 不好意思 先生？

translation.en: Do you know the quickest way to Wallace Orchard?
translation.zh: 你知道去华雷斯果园最快的路吗？

translation.en: -♪ It was Halloween night at the castle… ♪ -Hey, handsome. Soup's ready.
translation.zh: -那是城堡中的万圣夜… -喂 帅哥 汤好了

translation.en: One clam, one chicken noodle, and one split pea.
translation.zh: 一份蛤蜊 一份鸡肉面 一份干豌豆瓣

translation.en: So, you seem a little stressed. I mean, what can I do to help ya out?
translation.zh: 我感觉你有一点紧张 我能帮你什么吗？

translation.en: Maybe a glass of Chardonnay?
translation.zh: 一杯霞多丽？

translation.en: Well, to be honest with ya, I don't drink beer.
translation.zh: 跟你说实话 我不喝啤酒

translation.en: But do you have any silver bullets?
translation.zh: 但是你有银子弹吗？

translation.en: That is not on the menu tonight.
translation.zh: 今晚的菜单上没有这个

translation.en: But I happen to be an excellent listener if you want to, you know,
translation.zh: 你知道 如果你想说 我刚好是非常善于倾听的人

translation.en: share anything with me.
translation.zh: 你想跟我说什么都行

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: We all have a purpose.
translation.zh: 每个人的人生都有目标

translation.en: Some people's purpose is to make sure all the streets are clean.
translation.zh: 有人的目标是保证所有街道都整洁

translation.en: Some people's purpose,
translation.zh: 有人的目标是

translation.en: like Kenny Rogers', is to make sure there's great tunes on the radio
translation.zh: 比如坎尼·罗杰斯 是要保证广播上有动听的音乐

translation.en: that we can all sing along with on road trips.
translation.zh: 我们都可以在长途开车的时候听

translation.en: Some people's purpose, like you,
translation.zh: 有些人的目标 比如你

translation.en: are here to make sure that kids without parents end up with a mom anyways.
translation.zh: 就是在这里确保没有家长的孩子们 至少能有一个妈妈

translation.en: Who is nice and kind to 'em and makes them feel loved.
translation.zh: 善良、对他们好的妈妈 让他们感觉到自己被爱着

translation.en: -You happen to have any A1 Sauce? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你这里有牛排酱吗？ -有

translation.en: My whole life,
translation.zh: 我的一辈子
