translation.en: I felt my purpose was to make sure everybody
translation.zh: 我都感觉自己的目标是让所有人

translation.en: was safe and sound on Halloween.
translation.zh: 在万圣节安然无恙

translation.en: But tonight, I have failed massively.
translation.zh: 但是今晚 我非常失败

translation.en: Because a fine young man was abducted under my watch.
translation.zh: 因为一个好好的年轻人 在我眼皮底下被绑架了

translation.en: -That's on me. -No.
translation.zh: -都怪我 -不是的

translation.en: How can I help you?
translation.zh: 我能帮上什么？

translation.en: You just did help me by listening to my story.
translation.zh: 你听我诉说这些 就已经是帮我了

translation.en: Be careful today.
translation.zh: 今天要小心

translation.en: Danger is afoot.
translation.zh: 危险要来了

translation.en: Oh, well, I don't worry about me. I worry about my kids.
translation.zh: 我不担心自己 我担心我的孩子们

translation.en: Called home. None of 'em picked up.
translation.zh: 给家里打了电话 没有一个人接

translation.en: They're probably just watching a movie, though, and…
translation.zh: 不过他们可能在看电影

translation.en: -Tommy's keeping an eye on them. -Tommy?
translation.zh: -汤米在照顾她们 -汤米？

translation.en: I'm sure he's been there the whole time. Without a doubt.
translation.zh: 他肯定一直都在照顾两个妹妹 毫无疑问

translation.en: The night is young. Appreciate you being nice to me.
translation.zh: 夜晚才刚刚开始 谢谢你对我友好

translation.en: Of course, Hubie.
translation.zh: 当然了 修比

translation.en: You're the best person I know.
translation.zh: 你是我认识的最好的人

translation.en: You're always thinking of everyone else and never of yourself.
translation.zh: 你总是为别人着想 从来不考虑自己

translation.en: But I guess that's why you're a hero.
translation.zh: 但我猜 所以你才是英雄吧

translation.en: Did you see how scared Scooby was when that car started moving? [laughing]
translation.zh: 你看到车开动的时候 史酷比有多害怕了吗？

translation.en: -With his ping-pong paddle at the ready! -Oh, my God!
translation.zh: -他那个保温杯都要扔了 -天啊！

translation.en: What a buffoon!
translation.zh: 真是个小丑

translation.en: [mocking Hubie's voice] Mr. Hennessy! Mr. Hennessy!
translation.zh: 轩尼斯先生！

translation.en: There's somebody in the road.
translation.zh: 路上有人

translation.en: -Who the hell is that? -It's not moving.
translation.zh: 那是谁？ 没有动

translation.en: Looks like a dummy.
translation.zh: 看起来像假人

translation.en: You look like a dummy. Go out and get it out of the way.
translation.zh: 你才看起来像假人 出去把它弄走

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Now, see, that does it for me.
translation.zh: 你看 这个可以代替我了

translation.en: You like that?
translation.zh: 你喜欢这个？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不喜欢

translation.en: Scarecrow?
translation.zh: 稻草人？

translation.en: Lester!
translation.zh: 莱斯特！

translation.en: Lester!
translation.zh: 莱斯特！

translation.en: I'm gonna kick your ass for this, Lester.
translation.zh: 莱斯特 你再逗我 我会教训你的

translation.en: I swear to God, if you jump out of one of these bushes,
translation.zh: 我向上帝发誓 如果你从那些灌木丛里跳出来

translation.en: I'm gonna punch you in the face!
translation.zh: 我肯定要暴打你！

translation.en: What the--
translation.zh: 什么鬼…

translation.en: Lester!
translation.zh: 莱斯特！

translation.en: Where are you?
translation.zh: 你在哪里？

translation.en: [Hubie] Valentine family, where are you?
translation.zh: 瓦伦丁一家 你们在哪里？

translation.en: I'm coming!
translation.zh: 我来了！

translation.en: Danielle! Cooky!
translation.zh: 黛妮尔！库奇！

translation.en: I say, "Marco." You say, "Polo." Marco!
translation.zh: 我说“马可” 你们说“波罗” 马可！

translation.en: [man 1] Weirdo!
translation.zh: 怪胎！

translation.en: Marco!
translation.zh: 马可！

translation.en: [man 2] Asshole!
translation.zh: 混蛋！

translation.en: Hubie Dubois! Is that you?
translation.zh: 修比·杜布瓦！是你吗？

translation.en: [Walter] Oh! You must be Mrs. Dubois!
translation.zh: 你就是杜布瓦太太吧

translation.en: I'm Walter!
translation.zh: 我是沃特

translation.en: Nice to meet you, Walter.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你 沃特

translation.en: It's a shame what they've done to your lawn!
translation.zh: 他们这样对你的草坪 太可惜了

translation.en: Happens every year!
translation.zh: 每年都这样

translation.en: Not tonight!
translation.zh: 今晚不行！

translation.en: We need to talk.
translation.zh: 我们需要聊聊

translation.en: [Tommy] They're not up here.
translation.zh: 他们没在这里

translation.en: [Megan] They're not down here, either.
translation.zh: 他们也没在这里

translation.en: Danielle!
translation.zh: 黛妮尔！

translation.en: Cooky!
translation.zh: 库奇！

translation.en: -We didn't find them. -Hey! It's okay. We'll figure it out.
translation.zh: -我们没找到他们 -喂！没事的 我们会想出办法的

translation.en: -We'll find them. -[pounding at door]
translation.zh: 会找到她们的

translation.en: What are we screaming at?
translation.zh: 我们在喊什么？

translation.en: -Bam. -Mr. Dubois, I screwed up.
translation.zh: -砰 -杜布瓦先生 我搞糟了

translation.en: -I can't find my sisters. -You don't know where the kids are? Huh.
translation.zh: -我找不到两个妹妹了 -你不知道两个孩子在哪里？

translation.en: 'Cause I do. They're right here.
translation.zh: 我知道 她们在这里

translation.en: -[girls] Tommy! Tommy! -Oh, my God!
translation.zh: -汤米！ -天啊！

translation.en: I'm so sorry I left guys. I'm so glad you're okay.
translation.zh: 我丢下你们 太抱歉了 你没事 太好了

translation.en: You are so cute with them.
translation.zh: 你和她们在一起 好可爱

translation.en: You have a girlfriend?
translation.zh: 你有女朋友了？

translation.en: I saw 'em coming through the Old McMillan shortcut.
translation.zh: 我看到她们穿过老麦克米兰的近路

translation.en: It was funny, 'cause not many people know where that shortcut is.
translation.zh: 有意思 因为知道那条近路的人不多

translation.en: Just me and a friend of mine, Richie Hartman. When I was a kid,
translation.zh: 只有我和我的一个朋友知道 理查·哈特曼 我们小时候

translation.en: we used to finish our band practice and shoot right through there.
translation.zh: 经常乐队练习完之后 就直接跑到那里

translation.en: -Well, at least everybody's safe. -No one in Salem is safe tonight.
translation.zh: -至少大家都安全 -塞勒姆今晚没人能安全

translation.en: Do you understand me, Tommy? That's why I'm putting this family on lockdown.
translation.zh: 明白我的意思吗 汤米？ 所以我要封锁你们家

translation.en: Now, Tommy, you call your mother. Let her know you're home.
translation.zh: 现在 汤米 你给你妈妈打电话 让她知道你回家了

translation.en: Megan, you call your parents.
translation.zh: 梅根 你给你父母打电话

translation.en: Let them know you're staying at a friend's. That's for you.
translation.zh: 让他们知道你留在朋友家 算我帮你的

translation.en: You two, do me a favor. Eat all the candy you want, and then go straight to sleep.
translation.zh: 你们两个 帮我个忙 想吃多少糖都可以 然后直接睡觉

translation.en: And lock this door! No matter what, don't answer it!
translation.zh: 锁上门 不论谁敲门 都不要回应！

translation.en: What're you gonna do, Mr. Dubois?
translation.zh: 你要做什么 杜布瓦先生？

translation.en: I'm gonna do what I do every October 31st.
translation.zh: 我要去做每年10月31日都做的事

translation.en: Make sure every citizen in this town is safe and protected.
translation.zh: 保证这个城市的每一个市民 都安然无恙 受到保护

translation.en: Um, but do you have a bathroom I could use? 'Cause I, uh…
translation.zh: 但你们家 有厕所可以给我用一下吗？我…

translation.en: The soup kinda went right through me.
translation.zh: 我喝的汤直接下来了

translation.en: Upstairs.
translation.zh: 楼上

translation.en: Toilet? Is it a big toilet?
translation.zh: 厕所？厕所大吗？

translation.en: 'Cause I got a lot to do.
translation.zh: 因为我要在里面好久

translation.en: I know that howl.
translation.zh: 我听过这个叫声

translation.en: Walter Lambert!
translation.zh: 沃特·兰伯特！

translation.en: The transformation is complete.
translation.zh: 变身完成了

translation.en: While I understand that you are now a mindless killing machine,
translation.zh: 我知道 现在你是一个 没有感情的杀人机器

translation.en: I would like to speak with the human being that is deep down below your fur.
translation.zh: 但我想和你皮毛之下 内心深处的那个人类聊聊

translation.en: Mr. Lambert.
translation.zh: 兰伯特先生

translation.en: Walter.
translation.zh: 沃特

translation.en: I cannot, in good faith, allow you to hurt another soul tonight,
translation.zh: 我真的无法容忍你在今晚 再伤害一个灵魂

translation.en: even though this is Halloween, and even though I know this is--
translation.zh: 虽然这是万圣节 虽然我知道这…

translation.en: Mr. Lambert, you're better than that.
translation.zh: 兰伯特先生 你不会这么没有自制力

translation.en: You-- Did you really wanna defecate in front of me, sir?
translation.zh: 你…… 你真的想 在我面前大便吗 先生？

translation.en: Oh, now, you're eating it!
translation.zh: 现在你还开始吃上了

translation.en: Is that Michael Mundi you're eating right now?
translation.zh: 你现在吃的是迈克尔·蒙迪吗？

translation.en: Is he inside your feces?
translation.zh: 他在你的粪便里吗？

translation.en: -[barking] -Mr. Lambert! Get over here!
translation.zh: 兰伯特先生！你过来！

translation.en: [Hubie's voice] The only way to slay the beast is a silver bullet right between the eyes.
translation.zh: 唯一能够杀掉野兽的办法 就是正中两眼之间 射入一颗银子弹

translation.en: Yo, dawg! That's my bullet!
translation.zh: 喂 兄弟！那是我的子弹！

translation.en: Mr. Lambert?
translation.zh: 兰伯特先生？

translation.en: Mr. Lambert.
translation.zh: 兰伯特先生

translation.en: Mr. Lambert?
translation.zh: 兰伯特先生？

translation.en: Mr. Lambert.
translation.zh: 兰伯特先生

translation.en: Mr. Lambert.
translation.zh: 兰伯特先生

translation.en: This is not your fault!
translation.zh: 这不是你的错！

translation.en: You are cursed!
translation.zh: 你是被诅咒了！

translation.en: Hello.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: Mommy! No! Help me, Mommy!
translation.zh: 妈妈！不要！救命啊 妈妈！

translation.en: Help me! Help me!
translation.zh: 救我！

translation.en: -[man] And stay out! -[women laughing]
translation.zh: 出去！

translation.en: Oh, my God! Oh, my God!
translation.zh: 我的天！

translation.en: That was so terrifying!
translation.zh: 太可怕了！

translation.en: -That was even crazier than last year! -Yes!
translation.zh: -这比去年还疯狂！ -对！

translation.en: -How much fun was that? -That was so much fun. [laughing]
translation.zh: -有多好玩？ -太好玩了

translation.en: It almost made me forget that I buried my father today.
translation.zh: 差点让我忘了 我今天埋葬了我父亲

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: No, it's a good thing. I mean, not for him so much,
translation.zh: 不 这是一件好事 对他来说就不是好事了

translation.en: but it's given me time to be introspective.
translation.zh: 但这给了我时间反省

translation.en: -That's good. -I'm Pete Landolfa.
translation.zh: -那很好 -我是皮特·兰道尔法

translation.en: Oh, I'm Chantal.
translation.zh: 我是查特尔

translation.en: -Chantal? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -查特尔？ -对

translation.en: Come to me.
translation.zh: 变回来

translation.en: Walter. Come!
translation.zh: 沃特 回来！

translation.en: Here, Walter.
translation.zh: 过来 沃特

translation.en: I don't wanna do this.
translation.zh: 别逼我这样

translation.en: You've been a very good neighbor to me.
translation.zh: 你一直是我的好邻居

translation.en: But what has to be done, has to be done.
translation.zh: 但是我的使命还是要完成

translation.en: Right between…
translation.zh: 正中两眼…

translation.en: the eyes!
translation.zh: 之间！

translation.en: Oh, no.
translation.zh: 不是吧

translation.en: -[dog barks] -No!
translation.zh: 不要啊！

translation.en: Homeboy. Are you okay, man?
translation.zh: 老乡 你没事吧？

translation.en: -Dude. -No!
translation.zh: -兄弟 -不！

translation.en: This is not real. You get that, right?
translation.zh: 这不是真的 你明白吧？

translation.en: We're just trying to raise money for our school.
translation.zh: 我们只是在给我们的学校筹款

translation.en: Wait a second.
translation.zh: 等一下

translation.en: -Are you hittin' on me? -[laughing]
translation.zh: 你不会想睡我吧？

translation.en: Because if so, that is incredibly sick.
translation.zh: 如果真是那样 那可太恶心了

translation.en: We're having a conversation.
translation.zh: 我们在聊天

translation.en: Mm-mmm. 'Cause you're, like, three times my age, okay?
translation.zh: 你年龄是我的三倍 好吗？

translation.en: Thrice. I was born around the same time you had your first heart bypass.
translation.zh: 三倍 你第一次动心脏手术的时候 我才刚出生

translation.en: -[dog barks] -Oh, Buster! Hey, my big boy.
translation.zh: 巴斯特！嘿 我的乖狗狗

translation.en: Are you here to protect me from this weirdo man that's trying to hit on me?
translation.zh: 你是来保护我的吗？ 不让我被这个想睡我的怪胎拐走？

translation.en: [screaming] My eyes are on fire!
translation.zh: 我的眼睛着火了！

translation.en: -Why would you mace me? -Yo.
translation.zh: -你为什么袭击我？ -哟

translation.en: I'm a dentist. I help people!
translation.zh: 我是牙医 我帮助人们啊！

translation.en: Liar! Lucifer!
translation.zh: 骗子！恶魔路西法！

translation.en: [laughing] That sounds like Hubie Dubois.
translation.zh: 这个声音像是修比·杜布瓦

translation.en: And since I struck out with you, I'm gonna take it out on him.
translation.zh: 既然我在你这里碰了一鼻子灰 我要去找他讨回来

translation.en: Have fun with that.
translation.zh: 祝你玩得开心

translation.en: You gotta be-- Whoa. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 你要…

translation.en: There's this goof headed his way. Hubie Dubois.
translation.zh: 有一个蠢货正在往这边走 修比·杜布瓦

translation.en: When he gets here, I'll handle the scaring.
translation.zh: 等他到这里 我来吓他

translation.en: You just sit back and enjoy. [snickers]
translation.zh: 你悠闲享受就好

translation.en: [Hubie] Attention, haunted house patrons.
translation.zh: 注意 闹鬼的房子里的客人们

translation.en: This is a direct order from the AUU.
translation.zh: 这是AUU直接下达的指令

translation.en: Move quickly and quietly toward the exits.
translation.zh: 迅速出去 往出口移动

translation.en: The man-wolf has eaten his kryptonite!
translation.zh: 狼人把它的克星吃了！

translation.en: Pubie!
translation.zh: 怂逼！

translation.en: Oh, my God. This is a travesty.
translation.zh: 天啊 真是讽刺

translation.en: First, Mike Mundi. Now, Mr. Landolfa.
translation.zh: 先是迈克·蒙迪 现在轮到兰道尔法先生

translation.en: And why would God do this to such good people?
translation.zh: 上帝为什么要这样对善良的人？

translation.en: Good people? All those two ever did was abuse you, man.
translation.zh: 善良的人？ 那两个人总是欺负你 先生

translation.en: You know who should feel bad right now? Our wonderful mayor.
translation.zh: 你知道现在谁应该感到难过吗？ 我们优秀的市长

translation.en: I'm truly sorry.
translation.zh: 我真的很抱歉

translation.en: You knew that high school kid from the corn maze was missing.
translation.zh: 你知道玉米地迷宫里 那个高中生丢了

translation.en: -But you told nobody. -Yeah. Bad for business, I guess.
translation.zh: -但你谁都没告诉 -对 我觉得不利于商业

translation.en: Oh, they just found Lester Hennessy's car abandoned in the middle of Whipstick Road.
translation.zh: 他们刚刚发现了莱斯特·轩尼斯的车 停在威普斯提克路中间

translation.en: -No sign of Lester or Mary. -No!
translation.zh: -莱斯特或者玛丽不见了 -不是吧！

translation.en: So, we are cancelin' the fireworks
translation.zh: 所以 我们要取消烟花会

translation.en: and all other related Halloween activities.
translation.zh: 和其他所有万圣节相关活动

translation.en: -Officer Steve. -Not now, Hubie.
translation.zh: -史蒂夫警官 -现在不行 修比

translation.en: -I think I know who did it. -Oh, so do I.
translation.zh: -我想我知道是谁干的 -我也知道

translation.en: His name…
translation.zh: 他的名字…

translation.en: is Walter Lambert.
translation.zh: 是沃特·兰伯特

translation.en: -Walter who? -Lambert.
translation.zh: -沃特姓什么？ -兰伯特

translation.en: Scientists would call him a lyco-thorpe.
translation.zh: 科学家会称他为狼族

translation.en: I think he means a lycanthrope.
translation.zh: 我觉得他想说的是狼人

translation.en: -Is that what it is? -It's a werewolf.
translation.zh: -是嘛？ -是狼人

translation.en: -Okay. -Hubie, I will lock you up.
translation.zh: -好吧 -修比 我要把你关起来

translation.en: -I got four people missing here. -Officer Steve, listen to me.
translation.zh: -已经有四个人失踪了 -史蒂夫警官 听我说

translation.en: I saw the man destroy his home earlier today.
translation.zh: 我今天白天看到这个人 毁坏自己的家

translation.en: Then I saw him in the pumpkin patch.
translation.zh: 然后我看到他在南瓜地里

translation.en: His shirt was torn up. He was barking at the moon.
translation.zh: 他的上衣撕坏了 他对着月亮吼叫

translation.en: His arms were very, very hairy.
translation.zh: 他的手臂全是毛发

translation.en: Then I saw him at this haunted house, his tail wagging in murderous glee.
translation.zh: 然后我在闹鬼的房子看到了他 他的尾巴凶残欢快地摇

translation.en: -Wait, you talking about my dog, Buster. -That was Walter Lambert!
translation.zh: -等一下 你说的是我的狗 巴斯特 -那是沃特·兰伯特！

translation.en: Where does he live?
translation.zh: 他住哪里？

translation.en: Fifty-Nine Elm Street. Check on it.
translation.zh: 艾尔姆街59号 去看看

translation.en: -There's your killer. -[man on phone] Salem PD.
translation.zh: 你的杀人犯在那里

translation.en: Blake, I need you to go out to 59 Elm.
translation.zh: -塞勒姆警局 -布莱克 我需要你去艾尔姆街59号看

translation.en: There should be a guy there. New in town. Possibly shirtless.
translation.zh: 里面应该有个人 新来到这个城市 可能没穿上衣

translation.en: Yeah. Middle-aged, growls a lot, glue-on hairy hands?
translation.zh: 对 中年人 咆哮不止 粘合的毛茸茸的手臂？

translation.en: Yeah, I got him right here. Him and your boy, Richie Hartman.
translation.zh: 对 他就在这里 他和你那个人理查·哈特曼

translation.en: They both came by and turned themselves in, like, 45 minutes ago.
translation.zh: 他们两个人45分钟之前过来自首的

translation.en: Together?
translation.zh: 一起吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Apparently, Lambert is Hartman's roommate at the mental hospital.
translation.zh: 对 欣然 兰伯特是哈特曼 在精神病院的室友

translation.en: Sorry. Werewolf Treatment Center.
translation.zh: 抱歉 狼人治疗中心

translation.en: Lambert broke out about a month ago, and then Hartman broke out yesterday
translation.zh: 兰伯特大约一个月前逃出精神病院 然后哈特曼是昨天逃出来的

translation.en: to try to find him and convince him to come back.
translation.zh: 想出来找他 劝说他回去

translation.en: It's actually pretty sweet, isn't it?
translation.zh: 其实挺温馨的 是不是？

translation.en: So, you've had eyes on them for 45 minutes?
translation.zh: 所以你已经看着他们45分钟了

translation.en: [Blake] Almost, like, an hour now.
translation.zh: 已经快一个小时了

translation.en: And also, Lambert's real name is Nick Hudson. Yeah. Walter Lambert
translation.zh: 还有 兰伯特的真实姓名 是尼克·胡德森 对 沃特·兰伯特…

translation.en: is just some name that he got off a tombstone on his way into town.
translation.zh: 只是他进城的时候 从墓碑上看到的名字

translation.en: All right, Blake. I got it. Thank you.
translation.zh: 好了 布莱克 我知道了 谢谢你

translation.en: I feel bad you got yourself in even more trouble just to save me.
translation.zh: 你为了救我 让你自己惹上更多麻烦 我真的很痛心

translation.en: No, it was good to get out of that place for a while.
translation.zh: 没有 从那个地方出来一段时间 感觉还挺好的

translation.en: -You did me a favor. Thank you. -Did you do anything fun?
translation.zh: -你帮了我大忙 谢谢 -你做了什么有趣的事吗？

translation.en: I pissed on a tombstone, pissed on the street.
translation.zh: 我在墓碑上撒尿 在街上撒尿

translation.en: Just some fun pissing stuff, you know.
translation.zh: 只是各种有趣的撒尿

translation.en: -Nobody pees more than you. -I'm peein' now.
translation.zh: -没人比你更能尿 -我现在就要撒尿

translation.en: -That's a good roommate. Yes. [chuckles] -[sniffing, panting]
translation.zh: 真是个好室友 对

translation.en: -Who's a good roommate? Yes. Yes. -[barking]
translation.zh: 谁是好室友？对

translation.en: [Hartman chuckling] Yes, you are.
translation.zh: 对 是你

translation.en: Lambert and Hartman have been in custody during the whole Landolfa disappearance.
translation.zh: 在兰道尔法失踪的整个过程 兰伯特和哈特曼都关在警局

translation.en: So, it couldn't have been them.
translation.zh: 所以不是他们

translation.en: -[dog whimpers] -Buster, my baby!
translation.zh: 巴斯特 宝贝！

translation.en: Oh, by the way, he ate a silver bullet if you wanna check his feces tomorrow.
translation.zh: 对了 它吃了一枚银子弹 记得明天看一下它的粪便

translation.en: I ain't doin' that.
translation.zh: 我才不看

translation.en: Then who? Are there any clues?
translation.zh: 那是谁啊？有什么线索吗？

translation.en: Landolfa did go back into the haunted house to look for Hubie.
translation.zh: 兰道尔法确实 回到闹鬼的房子去找修比了

translation.en: Yeah. Hubie seems to be around a lot of people before they go missing.
translation.zh: 对 很多人失踪之前 修比似乎都在他们身边啊

translation.en: -People who have messed with him. -Did the Hennesseys mess with Hubie, too?
translation.zh: -耍过他的人 -轩尼斯夫妇也耍修比了吗？

translation.en: Oh, they live for it.
translation.zh: 他们乐此不疲

translation.en: So, it was payback time. Wasn't it, Hubie?
translation.zh: 那就是报复了 是吧 修比？

translation.en: No, I would never hurt anybody. I--
translation.zh: 不是 我从来没有伤害任何人 我…

translation.en: You got the wrong guy.
translation.zh: 你们猜错人了

translation.en: -Father Dave. -Have you been planning this all along?
translation.zh: -大卫神父 -你一直都在计划报仇吗？

translation.en: -[snarling] -You sick man.
translation.zh: 你这个变态

translation.en: -Have you? -I--
translation.zh: -是吗？ -我…

translation.en: Have you?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: Frankenstein!
translation.zh: 科学怪人！

translation.en: Did we just fall for the old Frankenstein trick?
translation.zh: 我们刚刚上科学怪人的当了吗？

translation.en: -[Aurora] Bad news, gang. -[thunderclap]
translation.zh: 各位 坏消息

translation.en: WTCH has just learned
translation.zh: WTCH电台刚刚了解到

translation.en: that Salem's Halloween is getting shut down.
translation.zh: 塞勒姆的万圣节活动关闭了

translation.en: [Aurora] The police department is advising everyone to stay home and lock doors.
translation.zh: 警方建议所有人留在家里 锁好门

translation.en: But, my little Halloweenies, we can all still celebrate
translation.zh: 但是 喜欢万圣节的人们 我们还是可以庆祝

translation.en: with nature's fireworks lighting up the night sky.
translation.zh: 因为大自然的烟火 会点亮今晚的夜空

translation.en: Not sure what's happening in this creepy town,
translation.zh: 不知道这个诡异的城市发生了什么

translation.en: but sounds like a good idea to cuddle up with someone special
translation.zh: 但似乎和一个特别的人拥抱在一起

translation.en: and enjoy the last half hour of Halloween under the covers.
translation.zh: 在被子里享受万圣节的最后半小时 是最好的主意

translation.en: And just hope that whoever you cuddling isn't a madman.
translation.zh: 不管你拥抱的人是谁 希望不是一个疯子

translation.en: Well, looks like I have company.
translation.zh: 有人来了

translation.en: So, we're going to take a word from our scary sponsors.
translation.zh: 我们要听听我们恐怖的赞助商广告

translation.en: -[whistles like theremin] -[man] W… T… C… H. -Aurora? -[gasps]
translation.zh: -WTCH -欧若拉？

translation.en: -[deep voice] Hubie Dubois. -Yes.
translation.zh: -修比·杜布瓦 -对

translation.en: I'd recognize that voice anywhere. You look exactly how I pictured you.
translation.zh: 不管在哪里 我都能分辨出你的声音 你和我想象之中一模一样

translation.en: To be honest with you, you don't look like the way I was picturing you.
translation.zh: 跟你说实话 你跟我想象之中 一点都不一样

translation.en: [high-pitched voice] I guess my radio voice throws people off sometimes.
translation.zh: 看来我广播上的声音很有欺骗性

translation.en: Yeah, that-- I think that's it.
translation.zh: 对 我觉得是

translation.en: [deep voice] Have a seat, man.
translation.zh: 请坐 兄弟

translation.en: What brings you all the way here this evenin'?
translation.zh: 你大半夜上山来做什么？

translation.en: As you know, I'm a longtime listener, and I always respect the advice you give
translation.zh: 你也知道 我是你们的长期重视听众 我总是尊重你给很多打来电话的

translation.en: to so many callers.
translation.zh: 听众朋友的建议

translation.en: Right now, I'm in dire need of the most perspicacious advice
translation.zh: 现在 我需要你给过所有人类的

translation.en: -you have ever given to any other human-- -[knocking]
translation.zh: 最明智的建议…

translation.en: [Aurora gasps] Oh, my God. Isn't that so sweet? My wife brought snacks.
translation.zh: 天啊 太温馨了 我妻子带来了零食

translation.en: [deep voice] Ooh! Hey, baby. How you doin'?
translation.zh: 嘿 宝贝 你怎么样？

translation.en: Oh, and who is this?
translation.zh: 这是谁啊？

translation.en: Baby, this is Hubie Dubois.
translation.zh: 宝贝 这是修比·杜布瓦

translation.en: Whoa! For real?
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: Yes. Nice to meet you, ma'am.
translation.zh: 对 很高兴见到你女士

translation.en: I'm looking forward to hearing your real voice.
translation.zh: 我很期待听到你的真实声音

translation.en: This is my real voice.
translation.zh: 这就是我的真实声音

translation.en: Right. I know it is. I was just saying, you know…
translation.zh: 对 我知道 我只是想说 其实…

translation.en: So, I am a big fan of your husband, Aurora.
translation.zh: 我是你丈夫欧若拉的超级粉丝

translation.en: Oh, yeah.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: I feel like you're the second most frequent caller we get.
translation.zh: 我感觉你是我们来电话第二频繁的人

translation.en: -Besides that one lady. -Someone calls more than I do?
translation.zh: -除了那一位女士 -有人比我打电话还频繁？

translation.en: [laughs] Actually, I think she might have a little something for you, Hubie.
translation.zh: 其实 我想她可能有东西要给你 修比

translation.en: She always dedicates a song to a special someone.
translation.zh: 她总是给一位特别的人送一首歌

translation.en: And we all need that special someone.
translation.zh: 我们都需要特别的人

translation.en: -Right, baby? -Yes, we do. Oh!
translation.zh: -对吧 宝贝？ -是的 没错

translation.en: Dig in.
translation.zh: 吃吧

translation.en: -A couple days back… -Oh, man.
translation.zh: 几天前

translation.en: …she had a couple glasses of Chardonnay. Her guard was down,
translation.zh: 她喝了几杯霞多丽 警戒意识降低

translation.en: and she asked to dedicate a special song to Hubie.
translation.zh: 她要求送一首歌给修比

translation.en: -Chardonnay, eh? -You know what they say about Chardonnay?
translation.zh: -霞多丽？ -你知道他们怎么说霞多丽吗？

translation.en: Truth serum. She said she's gonna show you how much she loves you on Halloween.
translation.zh: 真话血清 她说她会在万圣节 展示出她有多爱你

translation.en: -Do you think we could trace the number? -I don't need to. Caller ID.
translation.zh: -你觉得还能找到电话号码吗？ -我不需要找 来电人是

translation.en: Sound familiar?
translation.zh: 熟悉吗？

translation.en: No. But there is a number that needs to be dialed immediately.
translation.zh: 不熟 但是有一个号码 我需要立刻拨打
报警电话！

translation.en: It's a prepaid phone.
translation.zh: 预先付费号码

translation.en: -[high-pitched voice] Bitch used a burner. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 这贱人用的一次性手机

translation.en: Any idea of someone who might have a thing for you, or…
translation.zh: 知道谁可能对你有意思吗？或者…

translation.en: How would somebody detect such a situation?
translation.zh: 这种情况 应该怎么分辨出来？

translation.en: Anyone in town who seems like they might actually enjoy talking to you.
translation.zh: 这个城市中 任何似乎真正喜欢跟你聊天的人

translation.en: There's one woman, but she's the nicest lady I ever met my life.
translation.zh: 有一个女人 但她是我这辈子见过 最好的女人

translation.en: Well, they all seem nice till they kill you.
translation.zh: 所有女人杀你之前 都感觉挺好

translation.en: What's the desperate sicko's name?
translation.zh: 这个寂寞的变态叫什么？

translation.en: [whispers] The high school hat trick, Violet Valentine.
translation.zh: 高中三连冠 维奥蕾特·瓦伦丁

translation.en: Her? And you?
translation.zh: 她？和你？

translation.en: I mean…
translation.zh: 我是说…

translation.en: All right. Let's go see if we can get ourselves a confession.
translation.zh: 好 我们去看看 能不能拿到对方的认罪

translation.en: Ooh! This is some Dateline NBC shit.
translation.zh: 感觉像《日界线》侦探节目似的

translation.en: [Hubie] Stormhawk in position and petrified. Over.
translation.zh: 暴风之鹰到位并固定 完毕

translation.en: All right. First of all, we're not gonna use code names.
translation.zh: 好 首先 我们不会使用代号 好吗？

translation.en: -Okay? -[Hubie] Copy.
translation.zh: -好吗？ -收到

translation.en: Did you send backup to my residence to have eyes on my mother? Over.
translation.zh: 你派人去居民区 盯着点我妈了吗？完毕

translation.en: I'm a little short-handed tonight,
translation.zh: 今天晚上有点缺人手

translation.en: so I asked Father Dave to keep an eye on her.
translation.zh: 我让大卫神父盯着她

translation.en: Negative! Request armed units to that vicinity. Over.
translation.zh: 不行！请求武装人员去附近 完毕

translation.en: Sorry. I can't spare the manpower tonight.
translation.zh: 抱歉 今晚没有多余的警力

translation.en: Here she comes.
translation.zh: 她来了

translation.en: Okay, Hubie. It's showtime. Remember, we're lookin' for a confession.
translation.zh: 好 修比 表演时间到 记住 我们要的是让她承认

translation.en: But what if I can't get her to confess? Over.
translation.zh: 但如果我无法让她承认呢？完毕

translation.en: If you feel like you've done all you can, or you feel like you're in danger,
translation.zh: 如果你感觉你已经竭尽所能了 或者感觉自己有危险

translation.en: say the code word. At that point, we'll call the burner phone.
translation.zh: 说出代码词汇 到时候 我们就给一次性手机打电话

translation.en: If she picks up, we can implicate her that way.
translation.zh: 如果她接了 我们可以在电话里引导

translation.en: And what's the code word again? Over.
translation.zh: 代码词汇是什么来着？完毕

translation.en: -You don't have to say over. -[Hubie] Okay.
translation.zh: -你不用说“完毕” -好

translation.en: Code word is pumpkin.
translation.zh: 代码词汇是南瓜

translation.en: Roger that. Bogey on my twelve.
translation.zh: 收到 目标在我十二点钟位置

translation.en: Three on a match. Smoke 'em if you got 'em.
translation.zh: 三秒钟后启动 收到请吸烟

translation.en: "Smoke 'em if you got--" What the hell is he talking about?
translation.zh: “收到请吸烟”他说什么呢？

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 不知道

translation.en: What'd you ask me out here for, Hubie?
translation.zh: 你让我来这里干嘛 修比？

translation.en: What's up?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: Pumpkin.
translation.zh: 南瓜

translation.en: -Straight to pumpkin? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -直接就南瓜？ -对

translation.en: Pumpkin what?
translation.zh: 南瓜怎么了？

translation.en: Just pumpkin.
translation.zh: 就只有南瓜

translation.en: Don't kill me.
translation.zh: 别杀我

translation.en: -You gotta be kiddin' me. -Dialing.
translation.zh: -开什么玩笑 -拨打

translation.en: Hubie.
translation.zh: 修比

translation.en: I would never hurt you.
translation.zh: 我永远不会伤害你

translation.en: Thank you. Pumpkin.
translation.zh: 谢谢 南瓜

translation.en: Now! Pumpkin.
translation.zh: 快！南瓜

translation.en: -It's ringing. -Is this a prank?
translation.zh: -响了 -这是什么恶作剧吗？

translation.en: Is there somebody watching us right now?
translation.zh: 现在有人正看着我们吗？

translation.en: -No one can see us or hear us. -She must not have the phone on her.
translation.zh: -没人能看到或者听到我们 -她肯定没把手机戴在身上

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 喂？

translation.en: I just wanted to tell you that I have been in love with you since second grade.
translation.zh: 我只是想告诉你 我从二年级开始 就一直爱着你

translation.en: -What? -Hello?
translation.zh: -什么？ -喂？

translation.en: [whispers] Can you trace it now?
translation.zh: 能追踪到吗？

translation.en: Hubie, I've been in love with you since the first grade.
translation.zh: 修比 我从一年级开始就爱着你

translation.en: What took you so long?
translation.zh: 你怎么比我晚一年？

translation.en: I was in love with our teacher.
translation.zh: 我一年级爱着我们老师

translation.en: Miss Glennon?
translation.zh: 格莱农老师？

translation.en: -Wasn't she, like, 70? -I liked the way she smelled.
translation.zh: -她不是70岁了吗？ -我喜欢她微笑的样子

translation.en: I can't believe this.
translation.zh: 真不敢相信

translation.en: I can't believe that I spent three years with a self-confident-for-no-reason,
translation.zh: 我真不敢相信 我和那个迷之自信的大胡子恶魔

translation.en: bearded, human-ogre when I could have been with you.
translation.zh: 过了三年 而我本可以和你在一起的

translation.en: Ouch. That even hurt me.
translation.zh: 哎呦 我听了都受伤

translation.en: I'm getting a location. Steve, look at this.
translation.zh: 我拿到地址了 史蒂夫 看这个

translation.en: -[Steve] Stormhawk, abort! -I thought you were out of my league.
translation.zh: -暴风之鹰 放弃任务 -我以为我配不上你 -为什么？ -暴风之鹰 重复一次 放弃任务

translation.en: -Why? -Stormhawk, repeat, abort!
translation.zh: -为什么？ -暴风之鹰 重复一次 放弃任务

translation.en: It's the best news I ever heard in my life.
translation.zh: 这是我这辈子听过最好的消息

translation.en: Abort. The killer's cell phone is in your house!
translation.zh: 放弃 杀手的手机在你家里！

translation.en: Mama!
translation.zh: 妈妈！

translation.en: No! No way!
translation.zh: 不行！不可以！

translation.en: Lock your doors! Make sure you don't open them!
translation.zh: 锁好门！千万不要开门！

translation.en: Take care of your children! I'm gonna steal a boat!
translation.zh: 照顾好你的孩子们！ 我要去偷一艘船！

translation.en: Mama!
translation.zh: 妈妈！

translation.en: I love you!
translation.zh: 我爱你！

translation.en: Oh, no. They got Father Dave.
translation.zh: 不是吧 他们把大卫神父抓起来了

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 我的天

translation.en: Why aren't you watching my mother?
translation.zh: 你怎么没看着我妈？

translation.en: The killer's in the house! The killer's in the house!
translation.zh: 杀手在房子里！

translation.en: There's no one in the house but her.
translation.zh: 房子里没有人 只有她

translation.en: Hubie?
translation.zh: 修比？

translation.en: Can you help me down?
translation.zh: 可以帮我下来吗？

translation.en: Ma! Ma!
translation.zh: 妈！

translation.en: You're okay.
translation.zh: 你没事

translation.en: Why, yes, Hubie. Why wouldn't I be?
translation.zh: 对 怎么了 修比 我为什么要有事？

translation.en: Oh, no.
translation.zh: 不是吧

translation.en: So, um…
translation.zh: 所以…

translation.en: Am I your special someone, Mom?
translation.zh: 我是你的特别之人 妈妈？

translation.en: Always, Hubie.
translation.zh: 永远都是 修比

translation.en: And… today, did you--
translation.zh: 那… 今天 是你…

translation.en: did you try to show me just how much you love me?
translation.zh: 你是想告诉我 你有多爱我吗？

translation.en: Why, yes, I did, Hubie. I truly did.
translation.zh: 对 是的 修比 确实是的

translation.en: -[man 1] Hubie! -[woman 1] Hubie!
translation.zh: -修比！ -修比！

translation.en: [man 1] Get us out of here! Help!
translation.zh: -放我们出去！ -救命！

translation.en: [Landolfa] Hubie, please, get us out of here!
translation.zh: 修比 拜托 放我们出去！

translation.en: Hubie, there's something wrong with your mom!
translation.zh: 修比 你妈妈有问题！

translation.en: Come on over here and let me punch your mom in the face!
translation.zh: 过来 让我打你妈妈

translation.en: I mean, the good news is you're still alive. I was--
translation.zh: 好消息是 你们还活着 我…

translation.en: Nice observation, toolbox! Now get us out of this!
translation.zh: 观察得不错 废物！放我们走！

translation.en: -I'm so sorry. -I tried to explain to you already, Hubie.
translation.zh: -太抱歉了 -我已经试着向你解释过了 修比

translation.en: If you don't fight back, the bullies never stop.
translation.zh: 如果你不反击 霸凌者永远不会住手

translation.en: So, I had to fight back for you.
translation.zh: 所以我必须替你反击

translation.en: [Mike] Please, Hubie! Oh, my God!
translation.zh: -拜托 修比！ -我的天

translation.en: Hubie, that's gas!
translation.zh: 修比 那是汽油！

translation.en: Mommy, I would've been satisfied if you put itching powder in their sleeping bag.
translation.zh: 妈妈 你在他们的睡袋里放瘙痒粉 我就已经很满足了

translation.en: This is extreme.
translation.zh: 这太极端了

translation.en: Don't do this to me. Hubie, I'll be your friend forever!
translation.zh: 不要这样对我 修比 我会永远做你的朋友！

translation.en: [man] The old lady said they'd be in the backyard.
translation.zh: 老太太说 他们会在后院

translation.en: [Tracy] Roll it! Roll it!
translation.zh: 开拍！

translation.en: You don't have to do this. This is too much.
translation.zh: 妈妈 你真不用这样 有点太过了

translation.en: We are here and we are live at an unfolding scene of Halloween horror.
translation.zh: 我们在这里直播 揭开万圣节恐怖之谜的现场

translation.en: -[victims shouting, chattering] -[Hubie] Ma. Ma.
translation.zh: 妈

translation.en: -Mom, I really don't want you to do this. -I know, Hubie.
translation.zh: -妈妈 我真的不想让你这样 -我知道 修比

translation.en: That's what makes you so wonderful. And that's why I have to do it.
translation.zh: 所以你才这么好 所以我才更要这样做

translation.en: I have to make it good for you before I go.
translation.zh: 我必须要在走之前 帮你解决好

translation.en: Before you go?
translation.zh: 在你走之前？

translation.en: -To Heaven? -No. Probably going to Hell, Hubie.
translation.zh: -去天堂？ -不 可能是去地狱 修比

translation.en: The cops are here! You're goin' to jail, you crazy old bat!
translation.zh: 警察来了！你要去的是监狱 你这个疯婆子！

translation.en: -Well, then I better do this now. -[Mr. Hennessy] My God. No, lady. Wait.
translation.zh: -那我最好现在赶快动手了 -天啊 不要 女士 等一下

translation.en: -[all screaming, shouting] -No! No, no, no, no!
translation.zh: 不要！

translation.en: -Please don't. -[Landolfa] Hubie, stop her.
translation.zh: -求你不要 -修比 拦住她

translation.en: -Hubie! -[Hubie screams]
translation.zh: 修比！

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不要！

translation.en: [echoing] No.
translation.zh: 不要

translation.en: Always thinking of everyone else, never thinking of yourself.
translation.zh: 你总是为别人着想 从来不考虑自己

translation.en: But I guess that's why you're a hero.
translation.zh: 但我猜 所以你才是英雄吧

translation.en: [Landolfa] Hubie!
translation.zh: 修比！

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不要！

translation.en: -Man. -Freeze, Mrs. Dubois!
translation.zh: -天啊 -不许动 杜布瓦太太

translation.en: Hold your fire until my command.
translation.zh: 不要开火 等我指令

translation.en: Why did we bring them again?
translation.zh: 我们为什么带他们来？

translation.en: There was nobody left at the station. We had to.
translation.zh: 警局没有人了 必须带上

translation.en: I'm sorry. I'm sorry, Mommy. This is my fault.
translation.zh: 抱歉 妈妈 这是我的错

translation.en: -[Mom] That's okay, Hubie. -[Landolfa] Hubie!
translation.zh: 没事的 修比

translation.en: -Untie us, dummy! -Come on, you stupid dummy!
translation.zh: -修比！ -松绑 蠢货！ -快点 你这个蠢货 放我们走 -快点松绑！

translation.en: -Untie us, now! -[Mike] Are you paying attention?
translation.zh: -快点 你这个蠢货 放我们走 -快点松绑！ -你有在听吗？ -好吧 哇

translation.en: [Mom] Okay. Wow.
translation.zh: -你有在听吗？ -好吧 哇

translation.en: Shame on you.
translation.zh: 真无耻

translation.en: Hubie just saved your lives, and you treat him like this.
translation.zh: 修比刚刚救了你们的命 你们就这样对他

translation.en: Can one of you tell me why?
translation.zh: 你们谁可以告诉我为什么吗？

translation.en: [Landolfa] Just look at him!
translation.zh: 你看看他！

translation.en: He's so… Hubie!
translation.zh: 他太…修比了！

translation.en: Yes, he's Hubie.
translation.zh: 对 他是修比

translation.en: He's helpful.
translation.zh: 他乐于助人

translation.en: He's courteous, he's cheerful, he's considerate.
translation.zh: 彬彬有礼、开朗体贴

translation.en: What a bad, bad man.
translation.zh: 人们真的很坏啊

translation.en: My great-great-great-great-great- grandmother laid down her life,
translation.zh: 我的曾曾曾曾曾祖母贡献出了一生

translation.en: trying to save innocent people.
translation.zh: 想要救无辜的人

translation.en: I was there.
translation.zh: 我当时在场

translation.en: And my son did her one better. He just saved four ungrateful jackasses.
translation.zh: 我儿子比他更伟大 他刚刚救了 四个不知感恩的大混蛋

translation.en: Thanks, Pubie.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 怂逼

translation.en: Well, you can't even thank him without insulting him.
translation.zh: 你连谢他都要侮辱他一下

translation.en: I'm sorry. I don't know why I said Pubie. It just came out.
translation.zh: 对不起 我也不知道 我为什么说了怂逼 自然说出口的

translation.en: Could it be because you feel threatened?
translation.zh: 是因为你们感觉到被威胁了吗？

translation.en: I feel a lot of pressure to be cool all the time.
translation.zh: 我耍帅总是感觉有很多压力

translation.en: I'm jealous of Hubie being able to be himself.
translation.zh: 我嫉妒修比能够做自己

translation.en: I lost my hair 20 years ago,
translation.zh: 我20年前失去了头发

translation.en: and every time I walk into a room, I feel silly.
translation.zh: 每次我走进房间 都觉得自己很傻

translation.en: Why should someone like Hubie have such a thick, luxuriant head of hair,
translation.zh: 修比这个人为什么 有那么浓密、茂盛的头发？

translation.en: and I look like a California raisin?
translation.zh: 而我看着像个加州葡萄干？

translation.en: I have never felt sexually fulfilled.
translation.zh: 我的性欲从来没有得到过满足

translation.en: -But-- -Oh, shut up, Lester.
translation.zh: -但是… -闭嘴 莱斯特

translation.en: You're usually there. You know it's true.
translation.zh: 你在场 你知道这是真的

translation.en: I'm guessing…
translation.zh: 我猜…

translation.en: Hubie hasn't had a lot of sex.
translation.zh: 修比没有经历过几次性爱

translation.en: No, ma'am.
translation.zh: 没有 女士

translation.en: Hasn't had any sex.
translation.zh: 一次都没有

translation.en: But what he does have is hope.
translation.zh: 但是他所拥有的 是希望

translation.en: Damn him and his hope!
translation.zh: 他和他的希望去死吧！

translation.en: I was diagnosed with dyslexia in the eighth grade.
translation.zh: 我在八年级被诊断得了诵读困难

translation.en: I faked it for the doctors, but I'm really just dumb.
translation.zh: 我在医生们面前假装 但我真的就是很笨

translation.en: I never really told anybody.
translation.zh: 我从来没有告诉过任何人

translation.en: You're probably all surprised.
translation.zh: 你们或许都很意外

translation.en: -No, I'm not surprised. -Nope.
translation.zh: -没有 我不意外 -没有

translation.en: -You surprised? -[laughs] No.
translation.zh: -你意外吗？ -不意外

translation.en: But Hubie uses big words, and they come out so natural for him.
translation.zh: 但是修比能使用大词汇 从他嘴里那么自然地就说出来了

translation.en: It pisses me off.
translation.zh: 这让我很生气

translation.en: Oh, 'cause of the dumb thing.
translation.zh: 因为一些愚蠢的东西

translation.en: My brother-in-law once said that I had no ambition.
translation.zh: 我姐夫有一次说 我没有野心

translation.en: And then he bit me, and I became a werewolf.
translation.zh: 然后他咬了我 我就变成了狼人

translation.en: You see?
translation.zh: 你看吧？

translation.en: Hubie's smart, has nice hair, and sex hope.
translation.zh: 修比很聪明 有着浓密的头发 还有性爱的希望

translation.en: But to me,
translation.zh: 但是对我而言

translation.en: his best quality is this.
translation.zh: 他最好的品质是

translation.en: He can weather all of your insults and your thrown objects,
translation.zh: 尽管你们对他的侮辱 尽管你们对他扔东西

translation.en: and he responds with humor and-- and kindness.
translation.zh: 他还是用幽默和善良回应

translation.en: Could you say the same?
translation.zh: 换作你们 能做到吗？

translation.en: Could any of you take the abuse you dish out to my Hubie?
translation.zh: 你们任何人能忍受 你们对修比的那些侮辱吗？

translation.en: I busted a guy for DWI last week, and, uh…
translation.zh: 我上周抓了一个酒驾的人 然后…

translation.en: he said it was an honor to be arrested by a Muppet.
translation.zh: 他说被一个大青蛙抓 是荣幸

translation.en: I acted like I didn't hear him.
translation.zh: 我假装没听到他说的话

translation.en: But then I cried in my squad car for about half an hour.
translation.zh: 然后我在我的巡逻车里 哭了大概半小时

translation.en: You see, Hubie. True bravery's being kind.
translation.zh: 你看 修比 真正的勇敢是保持善良

translation.en: Even to those who are being cruel to you.
translation.zh: 即使是面对那些对你残忍的人

translation.en: I just always wanted to be as nice as you, Mom.
translation.zh: 我只是想一直像你那样善良 妈妈

translation.en: Oh, you were nicer.
translation.zh: 你比我更善良

translation.en: But now I know that you're ready to spread your wings and fly without me.
translation.zh: 但是现在 我知道你已经 准备好展翅飞翔 独立起飞了

translation.en: You don't have to be scared anymore.
translation.zh: 你不用再害怕了

translation.en: I'm feeling emotional.
translation.zh: 我好感动

translation.en: -And a little horny. -Ooh!
translation.zh: 还有一点欲望

translation.en: -Not for you. -Oh.
translation.zh: 不是对你

translation.en: Just know that I'll always love you.
translation.zh: 你要知道 我会永远爱你

translation.en: And happy Halloween.
translation.zh: 万圣节快乐

translation.en: Frankenstein!
translation.zh: 科学怪人！

translation.en: [all] Where?
translation.zh: -在哪里？ -哪里？

translation.en: We fell for that twice in one night.
translation.zh: 一晚上被这个骗了两次

translation.en: We gotta try that with the orderlies when we get back.
translation.zh: 等我们回去 在护工身上试试

translation.en: -Okay. -It's such a… [laughing]
translation.zh: -好 -真是……

translation.en: Hubie!
translation.zh: 修比！

translation.en: The blood. It's going to my--
translation.zh: 我的血 到了我的…

translation.en: Happy Halloween.
translation.zh: 万圣节快乐

translation.en: One thing I still don't get.
translation.zh: -再见了 -我还有一点不明白

translation.en: Why did his mom have to kill Peanut the pig?
translation.zh: 他妈妈为什么要杀了花生那只猪？

translation.en: That was me, actually. I had a case of the late-night munchies.
translation.zh: 其实 那是我干的 我深夜突然饿了

translation.en: All right, we gotta get these guys back to the mental institution.
translation.zh: 好吧 我们要把这两个人 送回精神病院

translation.en: This has been a magical night in Salem, Massachusetts.
translation.zh: 今天真是马萨诸塞州 塞勒姆神奇的一夜

translation.en: -Excuse me. May I say something? -[Tracy] Yes. Please, go ahead.
translation.zh: -不好意思我能说句话吗？ -是 请说

translation.en: Hubie.
translation.zh: 修比

translation.en: I just wanna say happy Halloween to everybody in Salem.
translation.zh: 我只想对塞勒姆的所有人说 万圣节快乐

translation.en: Also, happy Valentine's Day.
translation.zh: 还有 圣瓦伦丁情人节快乐

translation.en: I'm talking to you, Violet Valentine.
translation.zh: 我在对你说话 维奥蕾特·瓦伦丁

translation.en: Also…
translation.zh: 还有…

translation.en: I just broke up with my Canadian girlfriend.
translation.zh: 我刚刚和我的加拿大女友分手了

translation.en: So, I am available.
translation.zh: 所以 我现在单身

translation.en: -Oh, my God. -Miss Valentine, this is for you.
translation.zh: -天啊 -瓦伦丁小姐 这个是给你的

translation.en: Hubie, do be mine.
translation.zh: 修比 做我的男人

translation.en: [Hubie] Yummy.
translation.zh: 美味

translation.en: Can you guys stop kissing and check out our costumes?
translation.zh: 能别亲了吗？ 看看我们的服装呗？

translation.en: Yes, of course. Come on.
translation.zh: 很好 没问题

translation.en: -Show us what you've got. -Please. Let's see it. Oh, my God.
translation.zh: -来 看你们准备了什么 -让我们看看 天啊

translation.en: Oh, well, look at this. I cannot believe we have this.
translation.zh: 看看这个 真不敢相信我们打扮成这样

translation.en: Father Dave. My childhood friend, Richie Hartman.
translation.zh: 大卫神父 我的儿时朋友 理查·哈特曼

translation.en: -Is that Officer Steve? -[Violet] Yeah.
translation.zh: -那是史蒂夫警官吗？ -对

translation.en: And the one and only Mr. Walter Lambert.
translation.zh: 还有唯一的沃特·兰伯特先生

translation.en: [Hubie] How did you do this?
translation.zh: 你怎么做到的？

translation.en: Terrific costumes, guys. Especially yours, Cooky.
translation.zh: 服装不错 各位 尤其是你 库奇

translation.en: I like it. What are you? A Muppet, right?
translation.zh: 我很喜欢 你扮演谁？大青蛙吗？

translation.en: Yeah, sure.
translation.zh: 对 没错

translation.en: -Our kids are so creative. -They are amazing. Mmm!
translation.zh: -我们的孩子们好有创意 -他们好棒

translation.en: You never kissed me like that, Violet.
translation.zh: 维奥蕾特 你从来没有那样吻过我

translation.en: I know.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: -Yeah, well… -Dad, don't forget your sash.
translation.zh: -对 -爸 别忘了你的绶带

translation.en: Okay, yes. Would you put it on me, please? That's right.
translation.zh: 好 对 可以帮我戴上吗？好

translation.en: Thank you, Danielle and everybody.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 黛妮尔和所有人

translation.en: I'll see you at the apple-bobbing contest at ten o'clock tonight.
translation.zh: 今晚十点的用嘴捡苹果大赛见

translation.en: Oh, and you two. You guys are gonna be hittin' the parties later,
translation.zh: 还有你们俩 你们晚点要去派对

translation.en: -so I made these for you. -[clicks]
translation.zh: 这是给你们做的

translation.en: That's some matzo ball soup, also with a flare gun.
translation.zh: 脆饼面丸糖 还有火焰枪

translation.en: You suck!
translation.zh: 混蛋！

translation.en: Sorry about that!
translation.zh: 抱歉！

translation.en: -Thanks, Dad. -Yeah, of course.
translation.zh: -谢谢你 爸 -没事

translation.en: And this is chicken gumbo with a hair dryer.
translation.zh: 这是鸡肉秋葵汤 还有吹风机

translation.en: [sighs] Wow, that is badass.
translation.zh: 哇 这也太绝了

translation.en: All right, guys. Take care. I'll miss you.
translation.zh: 好 各位 保重 好吗？我会想你们的

translation.en: -Mr. Mayor Dubois, let's get you downtown. -[car starts]
translation.zh: 杜布瓦市长 我带你去市中心

translation.en: -Bye! -Love you, Daddy!
translation.zh: -再见！ -我爱你 爸爸！

translation.en: Bye! We love you. We'll see you later!
translation.zh: 再见！我们爱你 晚点见！

translation.en: [Hubie] Bye, guys! Bye-bye!
translation.zh: 再见 各位！再见！

translation.en: Hey, Hubie!
translation.zh: 嗨 修比！

translation.en: You're the man!
translation.zh: 你最棒！

translation.en: Thanks. I learned it all from my mother, who's right behind you.
translation.zh: 谢谢 我从妈妈那里学来的 她就在你们身后

translation.en: -[all gasp] -Got you, O'Doyle!
translation.zh: 骗到你了 欧道尔

translation.en: -[kids laugh] -Happy Halloween!
translation.zh: 万圣节快乐！

translation.en: Happy Halloween to all! And to all, a good fright!
translation.zh: 所有人万圣节快乐 祝所有人开心刺激

translation.en: [Aurora in high-pitched voice] And so, another Halloween has come to Salem.
translation.zh: 就这样 又一年的万圣节 来到了塞勒姆

translation.en: So, you best take the advice of our beloved Mayor
translation.zh: 你们最好要听亲爱的市长的话

translation.en: and frequent caller, Hubie Dubois. And have a safe and fun time.
translation.zh: 一个经常给我们节目来电的人 修比·杜布瓦 祝大家平安、开心

translation.en: [Aurora's wife in deep voice] Hang on, baby. Got some spaghetti and meatballs for ya.
translation.zh: 等一下 宝贝 有点意大利面和肉丸给你

translation.en: [Aurora in deep voice] Okay. Let's Lady and the Tramp that shit.
translation.zh: 好 我们一起吃吧

translation.en: Murder!
translation.zh: 杀人凶手！

translation.en: [screaming] What are we screaming at?
translation.zh: 我们在喊什么？

translation.en: Last one. Sorry.
translation.zh: 最后一次 抱歉

translation.en: What are you?
translation.zh: 你是谁？

translation.en: [screaming] Who are you?
translation.zh: 你是谁？

translation.en: -What are you? [screaming] -[clattering]
translation.zh: 你是谁？

translation.en: -Boo! -[screams]
translation.zh: 砰！

translation.en: When I was a kid, I used to build a tower with all my candy.
translation.zh: 我小时候 会用我所有的糖堆一个塔

translation.en: And all the candy I used before the collapsing of--
translation.zh: 在塔倒塌前 我用的所有糖…

translation.en: Help me!
translation.zh: 救我！

translation.en: Now you're all in big, big trouble.
translation.zh: 你们现在麻烦大了

translation.en: [grunts] Oh, sorry!
translation.zh: 抱歉！

translation.en: That's you in a nutshell, Hubie.
translation.zh: 修比 这就是你的总结

translation.en: Here's some Happy Halloween word searches I printed out.
translation.zh: 我印了一些万圣节快乐的搜索词汇

translation.en: That-- that was-- that was-- Ah-- [bleep]
translation.zh: 那是…

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: [Rob] That's a good roommate.
translation.zh: 真是个好室友

translation.en: [June] Hubie Dubois!
translation.zh: 修比·杜布瓦！

translation.en: -This is Hubie Dubois. -Hubie, I'm standing right behind you.
translation.zh: -我是修比·杜布瓦 -修比 我就站在你身后

translation.en: Yes!
translation.zh: 耶！

translation.en: Freeze, Mrs. Dubois!
translation.zh: 不许动 杜布瓦太太

translation.en: Hold your fire until my command.
translation.zh: 不要开火 等我指令

translation.en: -Shut up! -Shut it!
translation.zh: -闭嘴！ -闭嘴！

translation.en: [Maya] What the hell are you doing?
translation.zh: 你他妈在做什么？

translation.en: Did that turn you on?
translation.zh: 有没有被勾起欲火？

translation.en: What is it supposed to be? Little penises?
translation.zh: 那是什么啊？小鸡鸡？

translation.en: Smell my feet.
translation.zh: 请你快点滚蛋

translation.en: Smell--
translation.zh: 请你…

translation.en: Smell--
translation.zh: 请你…

translation.en: -Smell my feet. -Really?
translation.zh: -请你快点滚蛋 -真的吗？

translation.en: Smell my feet.
translation.zh: 请你快点滚蛋

translation.en: Yeah. No, it was fun throwing hot dogs at him.
translation.zh: 对 没事 朝他扔热狗很好玩

translation.en: Pubie!
translation.zh: 怂逼！

translation.en: -We gonna eat Peanut tonight. -[horse neighs]
translation.zh: 我们今晚就吃掉花生！

translation.en: -He was my-- -You be quiet, too. You next.
translation.zh: -他是我… -你也闭嘴 下一个就是你

translation.en: -Oh, dope. -[all laughing]
translation.zh: 绝了

translation.en: [man] And… action!
translation.zh: 开始！

translation.en: No! No! No! No!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: [Julie] Hubie!
translation.zh: 修比！

translation.en: [Adam] Not cool! Not cool! Not cool!
translation.zh: 不好玩！
